sentence: United Kitchens is a company with shared kitchens for caterer  cook or food entrepreneurs in IleDe France
The process starts when the customer goes on the website www unitedkitchens fr and writes a message via the information request form
A united kitchens  employee sends an e mail and ask if they are available for a telephone meeting
The client answers
A united kitchen s employee calls the client and discusses about his needs and their offers
We agree on a time slot for the laboratory visit
The customer visits
The customer can take a break and take a coffee in the hall
Then  the customer comes back to the united kitchens  employee with a specific request
This request corresponds to the formula of united kitchens  offer that best suits his needs
The united kitchens  employee writes the contract 11  The united kitchens  employee sends the contract to have an electronic signature
The client can sign the contract on his phone  computer
The client signs the contract
The process is finalized
The process starts when a couple wants to go for a city trip in Belgium
The couple makes a choice between several cities
The couple makes a choice between several housings and sends request to the housing owner
Housing owner is notified that a couple wants to book a night
Housing owner asks for couple s personal information such as first name  date of birth  number of passport  ID card  and it is valid for 7 days
If there is no answer from the couple within 7 days regarding the personal information  the housing owner sends a reminder and waits for another 48 hours
If there is no answer within the 48 hours  the request is cancelled  and housing owner notifies the couple
After the booking is done  housing owner sends a link to proceed the payment online to the couple and it is valid for 3 days
One day before the expiration date  housing owner sends a reminder to couple if the payment is not received
When the payment is received  housing owner sends the order confirmation
If no payment is received within 3 days  the booking is cancelled  and housing owner notifies the couple
The process starts when Chloé wants to pass her driver s license
Employees are notified by email that Chloé wants to pass her license
An employee asks for the date by responding to the email
Chloé communicates her availabilities by responding to the email
Then  she waits for several days
Then she decides to practice again her manoeuvres
Meanwhile  the employee is checking availability
Then she passes the driving license
An employee gives her the certificate of achievement
Chloé takes the certificate and leaves the place  the process is finished

The recruitment process starts with a presentation to the 1st and 2nd year bachelor students to introduce them to the company  its project  the role of the students   and to inform them that the recruitment period will start two weeks later
These presentations are made exclusively in French
At the same time  activities are organised for interested people to get to know the company members in a more informal way
For example  these activities take the form of online drinks  escape games where the members of the company are mixed with the other participants  etc
The first week of the recruitment period is devoted to sending the candidates  CVs and their covering letters
The next two weeks consist of the analysis of the CVs and cover letters
Individual interviews are also conducted with the candidates during this period to learn more about them
These interviews take place in the company s offices
Candidates matching the required profiles are hired
If there are still vacancies  the company makes a new presentation and starts the process again until the desired profiles are found
First  the customer places the desired items in their online shopping cart
They then proceed to check out their order
If they are satisfied  they select the way they want their order to be shipped and  if necessary  indicate the shipping address
They then fill in the details to make their payment
Once the payment has been received by the company  the order is validated and a recap email is sent to the customer
In parallel  the company contacts its warehouse to prepare the order
When the order is ready to be shipped  the company sends an email to inform the customer that the order is about to be shipped
The company then contacts its subcontractor who handles the deliveries to ship the product to the customer
During the contact between the company and its subcontractor  the subcontractor may talks about its cash flow problems and asks to be paid more quickly
When the package has been delivered  the company sends an email to the customer to confirm that he has received his order and  if he wishes  he can complete a satisfaction questionnaire
The satisfaction questionnaire is not mandatory
Uber Eats is a meal delivery service launched by Uber in 2015 and based in San Francisco  California
The process starts when the customer places an order through the Uber eats application
For example  a Big Mac Menu at Mcdonalds
Then the restaurant receives the customer s order and starts to prepare it
When the restaurant has almost finished preparing the order  an employee starts the automatic search for a delivery person
A delivery person receives the order and goes to the restaurant to collect it
The restaurant gives the order to the deliveryman and he starts his delivery
At that moment  the customer receives a notification and he can follow the deliverer through the map of the application
The delivery man arrives at the customer s home and gives him his order
The customer receives the order and checks if the order is complete
If something is missing the customer must contact the restaurant to receive the missing meal
The customer marks the delivery as completed and the delivery person does the same
The process is finished
Prozis is a European brand of sports nutrition  proteins  food supplements and clothing with quality products at the best price
The process starts when a customer places an order on Prozis com
The order is registered as soon as the order is paid
Then  the order is prepared by the employees
When the order is complete  it is marked as ready to ship
When a carrier is available  the order is shipped
For each of the previous steps  the customer receives a notification on the website about the status of the step
One day before the reception of his order  the customer receives a sms concerning the approximate hour of delivery
If the customer is not at home  the order is dropped off at the nearest relay point
Then the customer receives or goes at the nearest relay point to get his order
The process ends when the customer receives the order
A client enters the restaurant to order food to go
The waiter goes to him to take his order
The client lists the food he wants
The waiter encodes it into the computer
The waiter prints the ticket
The waiter gives the ticket to the chefs
The clients pays for the order
Meanwhile  The chefs ask to the kitchen some ingredients to make the sushis
The kitchen guy gives the ingredients to the chefs
The chefs make the sushi rolls
The waiter packs the order into a bag with baguettes and salsas to accompany the sushi
The waiter gives the order to the client
The client leaves
A client sits at a table
The waiter goes and gives him a menu
The client looks at the menu
Once the client is ready to order  he makes a sign to the waiter
The waiter takes the orders
Coffees are excellent there
The waiter gives the order to the kitchen  if the clients ordered something to eat
Meanwhile  the waiter prepares the drinks with small biscuits to accompany it
The waiter brings the drinks to the client
The kitchen brings the food directly to the clients
The clients drinks and eats
The clients comes to pay at the counter
The client leaves
Le Brull  is a dental clinic attached to the CHU of Liège
The process begins when a patient arrives at the clinic
The patient goes to the reception desk  where he or she is asked whether it is an emergency or an appointment
He or she presents his or her identity card so that his or her details can be checked
In case of an appointment  the patient is directed to the waiting room  where the dentist concerned will come to collect him or her for treatment
If it is an emergency  the patient is required to wait for an indefinite period of time and care will be provided according to the degree of urgency of his or her case
For example  a broken tooth  an infection
Once the work is completed  an invoice will be sent to the patient within 24 hours
The patient leaves the clinic
He will have to pay for his care as soon as the invoice is received
If he has not paid after one month  a reminder is sent to him
The clinic in Waremme has a very well known surgery department
The process begins when the patient comes to the clinic s admissions desk
They are asked for their identity card
Then he is asked if he has insurance
If so  we check the e mail sent by the hospital insurance
If not  we send it to the insurance terminal
After this step  we explain the admission declaration  fill it out and has it signed
The admission declaration includes among other things the choice of insurance  the costs of the stay  the pharmaceutical costs  etc
Once the declaration is signed  the patient receives an identification bracelet and labels
Finally  the patient is sent to the surgery department
The surgery department is located on the third floor
The patient is then received by the nurses  who explain how the operation will be done
Uber Eats is an American online food ordering and delivery platform launched by Uber in 2014
The process starts when the customer selects a dish in uber Eats app and places an order
The consumer has the possibility to add a comment on the ingredients of the dish when placing the order
The uber software receives a request for a dish
The restaurant decides to accept or not the request
The restaurant prepares the order
If yes the uber software sends a request to a driver to deliver the dish
Then  the customer receives a confirmation and tracks the order progress through the application
The restaurant notifies the driver when the dish is ready
The driver delivers the dish and contacts the customer when arrived to destination
The uber software receives the payment by a credit card and sends the invoice by email
The uber software sends a notification to note the delivery experience and the restaurant
If the customer is satisfied he can tip the driver through the app
Campus France is the national agency in charge of promoting French higher education abroad  managing scholarships from French and foreign governments and hosting international students
The student builds his study project and learns about the training courses offered
The student prepares his application   for instance language tests  translations of diplomas     and creates his account on the site
The student submits his application online
The student pays the costs of the file online or on site with credit card or via a cheque
The agency sends a confirmation email
If the file is complete the agency validates the file on the platform
After a few days the agency sends a notice to pass the motivation interview by email

After one month the student starts receiving responses from universities  two possibilities    no admission  end of process    one or more admissions  the student receives the certificate of acceptance and makes his final choice
The student presents the original documents of his academic background and the certificate of acceptance to the agency
The student prepares his departure with the help of workshops organized by Campus France
The student fills his visa application with the certificate of acceptance signed by campus France
A so called  mini enterprise  is a company created by young people in their final year of secondary school  who in addition to this activity  study economics  for example
The process of creating a mini business begins with the application to LJE  the organization that oversees the activity
LJE takes the application into consideration and will then visit the students
The students submit the project  for example the creation of a drink  and briefly describe their ambitions
The students have to start looking for a minimum capital of 700 euros
Following this  an opening general meeting is held in order to legally create the entity
This is followed by a year of sales  fairs  and learning
If the project fails and the team dissolves  an extraordinary meeting must be called to warn the shareholders
If the activity goes smoothly  a general meeting is scheduled in April  all shareholders must be called at least 15 days before
If they do not wish to attend the event  they must either authorize another person to attend in their place with a written proxy  or notify the company in writing of their absence
The document must be in A4 format  sent in pdf format and legible
At the end of the year  the students dissolve the company  either by donating the capital to an association or by returning it to the shareholders
This depends on the dynamics of each group
If the share has increased in value  the shareholder will have realized a capital gain  if the share is lower than its initial value  he will have made a capital loss
For students who do not wish to dissolve the company  it is possible to continue the project and be supported by an incubator
The Erasmus is the journey of a lifetime
First of all  the student goes to the International Relations Department in order to consult various testimonies of former students
If none of them seduced him  they can either abandon their project or consider a double degree
In the latter case  they consult Mrs  Gillet and the process stops
If the student is interested and after consulting the testimonies  they will select their favorite destinations
They will then register in the student ranking
If their average is sufficient  they will be able to go to one of their favorite destinations
If not  they will be assigned another destination without affecting the rest of the process
Some students are very disappointed  frustrated and regret not having worked harder to get a better place in the ranking
Anyway  the student then contacts the university that will host them
They receive their learning agreement from the University of Liège  transfer it to their host university and start looking for accommodation
Students are also advised to learn some of the language of the host country  but few apply this advice

Once the departure date arrives  the student goes to their host university and gives a paper to be signed by the local office  which they send directly to the University of Liège to prove that they are in fact there
The student spends one semester in their new school
At the end of this time  the student takes the examinations and obtains a certificate of achievement  which they hand over to the University of Liège on their return
In case of failure  the student will retake the exams abroad  until obtaining the certificate  in order to close the Erasmus
The warehouse takes care of sending packages in the different office of the company according to their orders
The process starts when an office sends an email for placing an order
For example  pens  pencils  sheet of paper  staples  folders and so on
Employees are notified that an order is receiving
An employee looks the order
The employee prints the order
The employee prepares a cart and the order sheet
The employee moves around the warehouse and fills his cart according to the order
For example  he puts paper toilet  pens and coffee bag
Then  he puts the cart with the order sheet in the room of current orders
Another employee checks the cart and the order sheet to be sure there is no mistake
Then  he packs the order
Meanwhile  another employee prints the invoice with all the items in the order
The invoice is put in the package
Then  the order is filed in the loading room
A truck picks up the order and drops it off at the office  the process is finished
UnoBis is a restaurant which sells pizza and pates to takeaway
The process starts when a customer rings to place an order
An employee picks up the phone
The employee asks for his order
The customer communicates his order
For example  one pizza Sole Mio and one pizza Margherita
The employee notes the order and gives an hour to pick up the command
An employee prepares the order
The kitchens contain all the equipment needed to cook pizza and pates
Meanwhile  the customer leaves his home and comes to the restaurant
The employee hosts the customer
He says the amount of the order for the payment
The customer pays cash
You can t pay by card
The employee gives the order to the customer
The customer takes his order and leaves the restaurant  the process is finished
Traiteur de Haene is a caterer operating in Belgium  Brussels region  only in B2B
When a company wants to order food from them  they need first to check their website to see what the different offers are
Then  they decide which menu they want to order
It can be for example buffets  starters or several meals
After taking this decision  they need to call or send an email for information
When Traiteur de Haene receives the call or email  they will send a quotation in a document to be filled online
Then  the ordering company will fill the document and complete the order by sending their approbation by email or by phone
As soon as Traiteur de Haene have received the confirmation of order  they will encode it in their data basis
When the order confirmation is encoded  an order receipt will be printed
This receipt will be put in an excel file
The order is finally sent to the kitchen so they can start preparing it  depending on when is the delivery date and time
They are able to deliver during the day or on the evening
When the delivery time comes  the delivery team plan their delivery regarding the place and the time  and then deliver it
When the lunch or dinner is finished  the ordering company can choose weather Traiteur de Haene comes back to take the plates back or not
If they chose not to  the process is finished
If they want Traiteur de Haene to take the plates back  the process is finished when the delivery team has taken the plates back
In march 2021  if a person wants to enter Belgium from abroad  he she needs to follow some procedures
This situation is due to the corona crisis that the world is living
The person needs first to check which measures apply when leaving the country he she is currently in
Those measures are different depending on the country

When the person knows what to do to leave  he she needs to fill up an online document regarding the entrance in Belgium by filling many personal information and precising weather he she stays longer than 48h in Belgium or not and if he she is resident of Belgium
If the person is a Belgian resident  he she will not be asked to provide a negative PCR test before entering the country
If the person is not Belgian resident  he she will be required to provide a negative PCR test
If the person stays less than 48  the person is not required to quarantine and a PCR test
If the person plans to stay longer than 48h  he she will have to self isolate for 10 days  and to do a PCR test at the first and 7th day of quarantine
When the person enters Belgium  he she receives an SMS with a code and a link
The sms is written in Dutch  French and German
The person can then click on the link and book an appointment for the first PCR test using the code he she was provided
Another SMS with another code will follow for the second PCR test
If the second test is positive  the person needs to keep self isolating and do another test 7 days after
The process ends when the person is negative to COVID 19
Let s take the example of a mini golf
The process starts when a customer enters the mini golf
The customer asks for the equipment to an employee at the desk
The employee at the desk asks for the number of players and the age
The customer communicates the number of players and their age
For example  2 adults and 3 children
The employee in the equipment zone is notified with the equipment to prepare
The customer pays for the equipment in cash or card and also pays a deposit
Meanwhile  the employee in the equipment zone prepares the equiment
The customer goes to the equipment zone
The employee in the equipment zone gives the equipment to the customer
The customer starts playing
The customer comes back to the equipment zone and gives back the equipment
The employee in the equipment zone notifies the desk that the equipment is back
The customer goes to the desk
The employee at the desk gives back the deposit
The customer leaves
ASP Groupe is a renovation company which works with insurance company
The process starts when a customer calls his insurance company after a sinister
The insurance company contact ASP Groupe
An employee of ASP Group goes to the sinister to see the damages
For example  a completely burnt house
The employee draw up a quote
The quote is sent to the insurance company
The insurance analyses the quote and accept it or not
Meanwhile  ASP Groupe employee check the availability of its workers in case the quote is accepted
Workers can be ASP Groupe s workers or subcontractors
If the insurance company accepts the quote  the workers start to work on the sinister
The insurance pays the amount to ASP Groupe when the work is done
The Burger customers  order are received on the application
When an order is received  the central allocate the order to the restaurant closest to the customers  location
Once the restaurant receives the order  the chef take the right amount of meat patties out of the fridge
They need to stay out of the fridge around 10minutes in order for the cooking to be perfect
Simultaneously  the chef slice the vegetables and prepare the Fresh Sauce
The Fresh Sauce is a  The Burger special  sauce  customers love it
Then  the chef heats the bread before assembling The Burger
While the chef is cooking  the central check whether the payment from the customer has been received and book a delivery guy
Once notified  the delivery guy goes to the restaurant to pick up The Burger
He then delivers it in less than 6minutes to the client
That s what we call efficiency!
Alfred works as postman in the town of Saive
Everyday  he engages in a delivery tour to post letters
Each morning  Alfred bikes to the post station and get the letters
He also check whether packages need to be delivered today
If there are no packages  Alfred delivers the mail by bike  he enjoys it more
However  if there are packages to be delivered  Alfred drives the post truck because he can t carry all the packages on his back
He always starts by delivering mail in the neighborhood A  the farthest from the post station
Then  Alfred delivers neighborhood D  C and B  in that order
In the afternoon  Alfred goes back to the post station and prepares his next day delivery round
To do so  he allocates each letter to its right neighborhood
For every letter  Alfred must check whether it is well stamped
Once these tasks are done  Alfred is free to go back home and walk his dog!
The restaurant for which I worked  holds a managing system for the tables  bookings
When a client phones to book a table  and communicates the datum when he wants to come  the waiter needs to check the availability of tables
If a table is available on that day  the process will keep going  if no table is available  either the client will postpone to another date  or he will cancel his request and the process is over
If it s a table for more than 4 people  they will be sitting in the  Fish room   if they re less or equal to 4 people  they will be placed in the  Harbour room
If there is a free table in the room desired  the table will be booked and the waiter will communicate the table number to the client  in order to make it easier for when the customer arrives
The customer will communicate the accurate time when he will be there
The waiter will register the hour in his program
When the client arrives  the waiter has to open the table on his program to confirm that the client arrived

If the waiter hasn t opened the table on his program in the 20 minutes while the client was supposed to  the reservation will automatically be canceled and the table will be free again for an eventual other client
The waiter will go regularly to the client s table to check that everything is ok
All the food and drinks ordered by the client will be registered by the waiter on the program with the customer s table assigned
If the bill is more than 60€  a drink will be offered  otherwise nothing will be offered
The  table   on the computer program  will be closed when the client will have paid either by cash or by card
The process is finished
My sister is working as a recruiter in a big company in which there is a special process to hire people
First  when they are looking for a new candidate to work for them  she will place a job description on the website of the company
If someone is interested in applying for the job  he will be asked to send an email to her e mail address
She will receive dozens of applications
She will only keep people who can either speak English and or Dutch  those who can t speak any of those languages will be out
She will notify them by e mail that their application has been rejected
She will contact by phone the most interesting profiles to make an interview in face to face with them
On the phone  they will agree on a datum to meet
After having seen all the interesting candidates  she will write a report  a debriefing on the best 3 candidates and show it to her director
If the report is clear enough and that the manager can make a decision thanks to it  he will choose the candidate without having seeing him
Otherwise  he will arrange a meeting with the best candidates
If one candidate has been selected  he will receive an email to be informed that he is selected and the others who haven t been selected  will also be informed by email
If the director hasn t been able to make a decision with the report  my sister will organize another meeting with the 3 best candidates and her manager
2 days after the meeting  the candidates will receive a positive or negative answer for the job
Once one candidate has been selected  the process is over
A client makes an order to market buy a stock to his stock broker
The stock broker checks the price and the liquidity for the stock
The liquidity can show how many stocks the client can buy without having an increased slippage
The stock broker notifies the client about the price and the liquidity for the desired stock 5
The client either accepts or refuses the conditions for the trade
If the client refuses the trade  the process is finished
If the client accepts the trade  the stock broker debits the client s account from the sum dedicated to the buying of the stock
The stock broker places the order on the stock exchange
At the execution  the stock broker pays the stock to the seller and receives the stock bought
The stock broker notifies his clients of the good execution of the trade
The process is finished
The process starts when someone wants to buy a stock on a stock broker website
The interface of the broker website is ergonomic and gives a pleasant user experience
The customer places its order in the form dedicated to new orders and press Enter
The system receives the customer s order
The system places the allocated funds of the client on hold
The system detects which class of asset is in the order
The system performs a research to sort only the assets in the category chosen by the customer
The system selects the relevant asset chosen by the customer
The system can receive two type of orders  market orders or limit orders
The system recognizes if it is a market order or a limit order
If it is a market order  the system executes the order at the market price
If it is a limit order  the system places the order in the order book
When the order is executed the system takes the on hold funds to pay the seller
The system credits the asset on the customer s account
The system sends a notification of the execution of the customer s order
The process is finished
It is the Vice President  VP  of the CIO that organizes the recruitment in the CIO Essentia
At the beginning of the Easter Holiday  the VP informs the team that the recruitment will take place and organize a poll in order to set a date for the recruitment
3 days later  the VP selects the most popular date  this will be the date of the recruitment
Then  the VP informs the team and  especially  the communication team of the date
After that  the communication team posts a Facebook and an Instagram status saying that Essentia is recruiting
In the status  it is stated that the applicant should apply by sending their CV and a Cover letter
Moreover  there is a deadline in the status which is 5 days before the day of recruitment
Five days before the recruitment  all the members screen the CV and the cover letters and make a first selection between the applicants
It is rare that we refuse someone at this stage but it happens from time to time
if 2 3 or more of the members have accepted the applicant   in that case  the applicant is hired
If less than half of the members have accepted the applicant  in that case  the applicant is not hired
If less than 2 3 and more than half of the members have accepted the applicant  there is a discussion between the members and after the discussion  they have to vote again
Only the members of the CIO Essentia and participants on the humanitarian trip are going to sell croquettes
The process starts when the Event Manager sends to them the excel file in which they can register their sales
At the same time  the Event Manager informs every one of the deadline to send back their excel file
Essentia sells 7 different types of croquette s boxes
Then  the sellers register their sales in their excel files and collect payment from their clients
When the deadline comes  the sellers send back their excel files to the Event Manager
After that  the Event Manager has 24 hours to aggregate all the sales in all the excel files and write it down in a summary table

The summary table is also an excel file that computes the total number of boxes sold by everyone  the total number of boxes for each type of croquettes and the amount that Essentia is going to pay to the supplier
After the 24 hours  the Event Manager gives a call to the supplier to order the croquettes
The delay for being delivered is 1 week
The Event Manager usually orders a Friday in order to be delivered the Friday after
Two day before the delivery  the supplier sends an approximate hour of delivery by mail to the Event Manager
The Event Manager informs the croquettes sellers of the hour of delivery
2 days later  we are delivered at the approximate hour given by the supplier
The Event manager counts the boxes to see if all the croquettes are there
If some boxes are missing  the Event manager calls back the supplier and the supplier comes back to deliver the missing boxes
If all the boxes are there  the Event Manager distributes the boxes to the sellers
The sellers will then deliver their boxes to their clients
The day of the delivery  the Event Manager receives the invoice  by email
The invoice is 30 days to be paid
Then  on the day of the delivery  the Event Manager informs the sellers that they have 1 week to pay the proceeds of their sales to the Essentia bank account
1 week late  when all the payments are received  the Events Manager pays the supplier and the process is finished
Delhaize is a retail supermarket
The process stats when the truck unload the goods
A chief brings a roll to the shelf
For example  the roll of chips is brought in front of the shelf where the chips are
The chief prepares the shelving tool by putting the goods on it
The employees and students take the shelving toll to fill the shelves
If you cannot put all the goods in the shelves  you put the surplus in a bin that will be stored in the reserve
But before putting the surplus in the reserve  the bin will be controlled by an expert
Sometimes it can happen there is new product  so an expert has also to control
You repeat the operation until all the goods received are in the supermarket or in the reserve
BNP Paribas Securities Services is a bank providing services to fund
The Fund Accounting department provides the Net Asset Value  NAV  of the fund to the Management Company
The process of the NAV calculation starts when the accountant receives the signoff of the pricing team which is in charge of pricing the assets in the fund
Once we receive that signoff  we have to check if all the assets are correctly priced
If the assets are not correctly priced  we have to contact the pricing team to redo their job
Then  we can launch the calculation of the NAV
When the calculation is done  we print the 3 different reports and we check if the variations in the fund are not too big  it is a step of control
For example  if the variation is superior to 10%  we have to investigate what could happen
When we complete that task  we give all the documents to our supervisor who control the NAV to see if the accountant doesn t make a mistake
The last step is to send the NAV to the client who will accept it or not
If he doesn t accept the NAV  we have to recalculate it
We also have to respect the cutoff which is the deadline to send the NAV to the customer
From DR Congo  Grace McKenzi is a Montreal artist  a fan of Rap and French melody
The process starts when he chooses the main theme of the album mostly in relation to the experiences he is going through or has gone through in order to find the title of the album
He tries different instrumentals with different songs to see what fits with his lyrics
With his writing in draft format  he has to execute it in the studio with the engineer
This step is very important  if it is missed  the project is failed
This is the step of the repetition  here the engineer tries to put the lyrics on his different  yogurts  that the artist made during his preparation
This will allow him to be more comfortable during the studio recording
For example  when creating the album Melomaniac  Grace Mckenzi s first studio project  is an album in which he mixes different styles of music that have rocked him since he was young
Then  the sound engineer cleans up the recorded tracks of all the songs on the album
This step allows them to have clear  noise free tracks for the next step
The engineer puts all the tracks of a song together to get a raw finished product
This is the adjustment stage  this is when the engineer adds effects and boosts the volume of the songs on the album to get commercial quality sounds
It can be done by someone who knows how to do it or he can use paid sites like LANDR to handle the songs
Once the songs are finished  the artist decides to distribute the album on different download or streaming sites through distributors that you pay per month like Distrokid  Amuse
EVRARD DPE   PHARMALPA is one of the oldest French pharmaceutical depositories
The exercise starts with the control of the product  the labeling  and the stocking of the goods
The forklift operator picks up the goods to start the preparation
He uses the Flash at the beginning of the tour to transmit the voice order information
The operator collects the orders in a box and then scans them
Once the order is completed  it is checked by weighing to see if the prepared weight of the package matches the theoretical weight
If the weighing is not in conformity  a red sticker is put on the parcel
It will be checked manually by another operator
The package with Caudalie products must be prepared for shipment to the pharmacy
The operator checks the parcel  closes it and chooses the shipping mode if the parcel is not in conformity  the quantity is checked  and then a red label is put on it
The operator chooses a mode of shipment according to the size of the package or TNT package of 1 to 14 packages or delivery by pallets   15 packages using software
The procedure ends when they deliver to the different pharmacies
Carrefour is a supermarket that offers a self service payment method
The process begins when a customer goes in the supermarket
The customer takes a device capable of scanning its items
The customer goes shopping in the store
At each item he has to scan it
The customer goes to the self service checkout
The customer put the device back
Carrefour receive the list of its items and gives the price he has to pay
The customer pays for the items
The customer can leave the store with its items and saves time
Cooper vision is a company that manufactures contact lenses
The process begins when the customer goes on the website of the company
The customer has to register on the website
The customer has to make an order with the products that he wants
The customer pays for the order
Cooper Vision receives the order into its system
The order is transferred to the order pickers
Order pickers can browse the shelves to complete the order
The order is then packed and sent to the customer
The customer receives the order with the right product and enjoys the product
The process starts by sending an email to the person in charge of external relations
he must confirm the reception of the request if not the student must send another request
After the confirmation  the student must wait until March 12
the responsible will send an email to the student  either he will confirm his selection or not
if the student is not selected it is the end of the process if not the student must reconfirm his interest to go on exchange to responsible
after the confirmation student must fill a form on my ulg
the process starts with the customer s need
Once the request is entered by the customer  he sends it to the company SOFAZEN and specifically to the administration
which  in turn  sends him an quote after having ensured the availability of the goods requested by  the storekeeper
If the furniture does not in stock  the storekeeper should send an apology message to the customer
If the furniture is available  the customer has the possibility to refuse the prices and therefore the end of the process or to accept  price set by the company
therefore he should send a purchase order that will be received by the storekeeper
the storekeeper has to prepare the furniture supporting documents
he should send the invoice and delivery note to logistics department and a copy of the invoice to the accountant
The accountant should record the sale and logistic department must deliver the order
After receiving the furniture  customer sign the delivery note and send it to administration
Boulangerie Baijot is a family bakery in Gedinne  Wallonia
The process starts when a customer comes into the bakery
As the bells rings when the doors are opened  the worker is aware that a customer is there
The worker says Hello and asks for the order at the customer
The customer gives the order
For example  a multigrain bread and four croissants
The employee takes bags and put the bread and the croissants into these bags
Then  the employee calculates what the customer should pay
The calculating machine is integrated into the cash register
The customer pays by card or cash
The baker is in the room at the back of the store
The vendor gives the order to the customer
The customer takes his order and leave  the process is then finished
The process starts when friends meet at the appointment place
The appointment place is Kayaks La Vanne  Alle sur Semois  Belgium
The friends go to the reception where the employees are
The employee asks which length they want to do  what type of kayak and what material they need
The friends answer and say how many kilometers they will do and what they need
For example  they will do 17 kilometers in two places kayaks and they need 1 bucket per person
The employee explains the route and the instructions
They cannot stop between two official stops and must arrive before 7pm
The boss is sitting to answer mails in the same room
Then  the employee calculates the price for the group
The friends pay by card or cash
The employees prepare the kayaks
The friends get into the kayaks and start their trip
They can stop on the way if they want to eat or drink something
For example  they can go to the pizzeria  La Riviera  in Vresse sur Semois
When they are arrived at the end of the trip  they have to call the employees to mention it
The employee takes the minibus and goes to get the friends and the kayaks
The employee and the friends come back in Alle sur Semois  the process is finished
The process starts when a client makes an online booking
While doing it  he has to provide us several personal information  First name  last name  mail address  phone number
But also  information concerning their demand  date  hour  number of participants  minimum two players required   and the platform on which they desire to play
Concerning the date and the hour  an interactive calendrer is available  and they can only choose if it s available
Furthermore  the booking has to be made at least 3 days before the session day
Then  the client has to pay online  and only once it s done  the booking is completed
One Reality has three types of platform   Vex    Arena  and  Anvio
The three platforms can be used by different clients at the same time slot
Two days before the session  the HR will adjust the students  schedules according to the booking
One student per type of platform is necessary
An automatic reminder is sent by mail to the client the day prior to the session
On the day of the session  the students welcome the clients
After making them sign an agreement stating that they will take care of the material  the student brings the clients to their platform
He then gives a safety briefing and helps them set up all the equipment
Once the customers are ready  he gives a short briefing on the game  before launching them
While the clients are playing  the student stays close to the platform to be able to react in case of software or hardware bugs
Once the game is over  he helps the customers to remove the equipment
Then  once the customers have left  he cleans up all the equipment
There are two major diving leagues  Lifras and PADI  we will talk about the former
There are 6 diving certificates in the Lifras  1 to 3 stars  club  federal and national instructor
We will concentrate on the star certificates  the instructor certificates being a very special process
Before a diver can obtain a certificate  he or she must register with a club
Once this is done  the diver will then be registered with Lifras and will receive a membership card after paying the registration fee
A fee will then have to be paid each year to keep the membership card up to date
Once this membership card is received  the diver can register for a certificate
Please note that it is mandatory to have the certificate of the previous level
The diver will start two types of courses at the same time  theoretical courses and training courses in the pool
These two courses will last a little less than a year
After this period  the club will contact Lifras to organize an examination session
External instructors will be contacted to supervise the exam
When enough external instructors are present for the date desired by the club  the date is communicated to all participants
Participants must also pay the examination fee
On the day of the exam  the participant will have 2 parts  a theoretical exam  written and oral  and a practical one in the pool
They must pass both
If one part is failed  a second session can be organized within one month
If they fail both at the first session or if they fail again at the second session  they will have to start again from the beginning and take the whole test the next time
If both parts are passed  participants receive proof of their success
Once this proof is sent to Lifras  the process ends for the brevet 1* with the receipt of the participant s updated membership card
For certificates over that level  phase 2 begins
Participants must complete a set of outdoor exercises in a real situation  as well as a minimum of diving
For those exercises to be legal  the club must be notified 24 hours in advance and an instructor must be present during the dive
A briefing will be held after the dive between the instructor and the participant  whether the exercise is successful or not
If the exercise is unsuccessful  participants may retry the exercise as many times as necessary as long as the previous steps are respected
Once all the exercises have been completed  participants send proof of successful completion of the exam and the exercises to Lifras  who will then send them their updated membership cards
The process starts when a customer asks for a car reparation by phone  mail or in place
The car employees are notified
An employee processes the request
The employee creates a repair file
The employee creates a customer file if it is a new customer or update the customer file if the customer is already in the database
The employee makes an appointment for the reparation
Day minus 1  an email and sms is sent to the customer to recap the appointment that will happened tomorrow
D Day  the car is repaired
An employee completes the repair file
The employee creates the invoice
The employee sends the invoice to the customer by mail
The customer pays the invoice within 7 days
7 days after the reparation  an satisfaction survey is sent by mail to the customer
The process ends
The process starts when the legal guardian of the customer sends a mail or calls the travel agency for a reservation
If the stay is already complete  an employee contacts the legal guardian that the stay is not available anymore and the process ends
If the stay is not complete  an estimate is created and is sent to the legal guardian
The legal guardian has 7 days to accept the estimate
Once the estimate is accepted  an information document about the customer is sent to the legal guardian by mail or by post
If the estimate is not accepted  the process ends
An employee creates an invoice
The legal guardian sends an deposit of the half of the stay price within 7 days
The legal guardian sends the completed information document within 7 days
When the deposit and the completed information document are received  the travel agency prepares the required medical material in the vacation spot
The legal guardian needs to pay the total amount of the stay price 7 days before the beginning of the stay
When the legal guardian pays the total amount of the stay  the invoice is completed and is sent to the legal guardian
D Day  the stay begins   the employees of the travel agency come and get the customer in the institution and go to the vacation spot
The stay ends on the 8th day
The employees bring back the customer to the institution where he lives
15 days after the end of the stay   the travel agency contacts the institution  the legal guardian and the customer to have a satisfaction survey
The process ends
The process starts when a customer makes an order on the app and pays
TakeAway employees are notified that an order was made
The restaurant receives the order
The restaurant cooks the order
Meanwhile  the employee of TakeAway is going to the restaurant
The restaurant finishes the order
The delivery person takes the order and begins the journey to the customer
At the same time  the customer receives a notification of the progress of his order
The delivery person is arrived  he sends a message to the customer to notify his presence
The customer receives the order  the process is finished
ING is a multinational Bank well known for his online services
The process starts when a client prospect request an appointment via a Web form
ING agents received and check the request elements of the client prospect
ING agents approve or reject the request
If the Web form was not well fulfilled the agents reject the request and notified the reasons to the client with an email  the appointment request process stops
If the Web form is approved  the appointment request process continue and the client receive a confirmation email with some specifications and code number for the appointment date
The client waits from 1 to 30 days depending on the appointment date delivered
An appointment reminder is sent to the client prospect by the Bank a day ago the appointment day
For example  Good morning Jonas This is Jake Hall from ING Bank This is just a reminder for our appointment at 1 p m  tomorrow
The client prospect arrives to the ING bank at the agreed time and waits from 1 to 15 minutes for being called by the agent
The ING bank has a large room with sofas where the clients can wait
The client prospect meets the agent and gives the appointment code number received in the confirmation email  the process is ended
The French Institute of Madrid is a prestigious language school with a wide library that has all kinds of books to learn to speak French
The process starts when the librarian receives a student book request via the online website
The librarian checks the  book status  on the data base
The librarian extracts the book availability from the data base
If the book is already loan  the librarian notified the student with an email and the process stops
If the book is available  the librarian notified the student with an email specifying the date to come to pick it up and the date to return it
The student come as agreed and shows his student card to pick up the book
At the same time the librarian checks if the student is not in delay with other books on loan
If the student has pending books to deliver  the process stops until the student delivers the books
If the student has not pending books to deliver  the process continues and the librarian scan and deliver the book to the student
Before leaving  the student signs the loan concessions of the book and keeps it for the next six weeks at most
A week before the books return date  the student receives an email return day reminder
The student comes on time as agreed to the library
While waiting for the librarian  the student can wait in the cafeteria
The librarian checkout the book and if the loan concessions were respected
For example  the librarian checks if the book was ripped or cut
If everything is in order the student can leave and the process is ended
However  if the book is damaged or got lost the student will pay a fee before ending the process
La Bodega is a restaurant that offers Spanish cuisine to its customers
The process begins when customers arrive at the restaurant
One of the waiters welcomes them  places them at a table and gives them a menu
The waiter waits until the customers are ready to order and then he takes the order of drinks and food
For example  3 Coke  2 paella and 1 tortilla
Afterwards  he will say the order of the dishes to the cook
The waiter prepares the drinks and brings them to the table  the waiter is considered to be a barman and waiter at the same time
Meanwhile the cook starts to make the dishes
Once the dishes are finished  the cook tells the waiter
The waiter picks up the dishes in the kitchen and brings them to the table
The customers eat
Once they are finished  the waiter takes them away
The customers ask for the bill
The waiter brings the bill to the customers  they pay and leave  the process is over
Basic Fit is a low cost gym
The process starts when the customer arrives at the gym and goes to the reception desk
An employee welcomes him  shows him the prices and tells him that he has the right to have a free session to see if he likes the gym or not
The employee will show him where the changing rooms are and explain how the machines work
The client then begins his free session
After that  he has 2 choices  either he doesn t like it and so he says so and leaves
In this case  the process stops there
Either he likes it and so he goes back to the reception desk to choose the subscription he is going to take
The customer makes his choice between 3 types of subscriptions  Either he chooses the one month subscription  the 6 month subscription or the one year subscription
The employee is going to ask him for some personal information in order to encode it in the computer
Then  the customer pays his subscription  the customer can pay by card or cash  and leaves
Afterwards  he comes back to the gym whenever he wants and since this is his real first session  a coach will discuss with him and observe him in order to create his personal programme
Note  The coach has a diploma  he has a bachelor s degree in sports coaching
Once the client has his own programme  he can come back when he wants to train at the gym and can decide to either follow his programme or use all the machines as he wishes
The process will end at the end of his subscription if the client decides not to renew it  but he can also decide to extend it as many times as he wants for the period he wants
The citizen receives a convocation to renew his ID card
Once he has been to the photographer to get a conformed picture  he goes to the municipal administration with the convocation and the picture
The administration agent takes the digital fingerprints of the citizen and scans his ID picture
The citizen signs the document on the signpad
The administration agent asks the ID card to the  SPF intérieur
The citizen pays by card or in cash
The price varies according to the municipal tax applied to the basic price
After about 15 days  the administration receives the ID card
2 days after  the citizen receives a document with his pin and puk codes
Once he has received it  he comes back to the administration to collect his ID card with the received document
For that  the administration agent takes again the digital fingerprints of the citizen
Finally  the citizen taps his pin and puk codes to activate the ID card
He gives back his previous card to receive the new one
For a middle aged citizen  the ID card is valid for 10 years
In case that the citizen does not report to the municipal administration  the administration sends him a reminder
New Quita is a chip shop located in Eynatten
The process starts when a customer enters the chip shop
An employee asks him for his order
Once the order has been taken  the customer pays by card or cash
If the customer pays in cash  he has to place the money in the machine provided for this purpose
The machine is able to give change if necessary
After that  the employee gives a box to the customer
The customer goes to sit at a table
During this time  the employee prepares the customer s order
When the box rings  he goes to the counter to take the plate with his order
He goes back to his table and eats
When the customer has finished eating  he tidies up his plate and leaves
The employee cleans the table where the customer was sitting and the process is completed
Otolift is a company that sells stairlifts
The process starts when a customer sees an advertisement of Otolift on the Internet or on a magazine
The customer is attracted by the advertisement
The advertisement are seen on magazines or heard on the radio
If he is in need of a stairlift  he calls the call center in order to get an appointment with a seller for a quote
The call is received by the call center
The call center answers the phone
Depending on where the call comes from  they will put the appointment in the agenda of one of the nine salesmen depending on where the salesman is on a certain day
On the day of the appointment  the salesman goes to the customer  he makes his presentation in order to sell
Here  there are 3 possibilities
If no direct sale  the salesman fills in the customer s card on his Ipad with all the explanations on what happened  who was there  for whom  customer s budget  for when
He puts a date in the software to call the person back to find out what s going on until people have made a decision
If they buy the process in point 3 is started
If they want to wait several months  in this case the salesman will call back later
If they have chosen a competitor  the sale is closed
If it is a file with a state subsidy  AVIQ   the seller then calls back every month to find out if the customer has any news from the AVIQ
AVIQ means  Agence pour une vie de qualité
If so and they buy the process in point 3 begins
For the payment of the stairlift  the customer receives a session of debt and this is given to the assembler when the work is completed
Otolift will then send this claim session back to the AVIQ for payment
If yes and they do not buy from Otolift  the sale is closed
If they did not hear from it yet  the seller will have to call back later
If there is a sale  the salesperson is very happy
The seller has the order form signed and sends it to the factory in Belgium
He makes the measurements that he will have to send on one hand to the factory in Holland and on the other hand to the factory in Belgium with additional explanations
A few days later  through a simulation thanks to the measurements  we can see if there is a problem with the knees rubbing against the wall
If this problem occurs  the salesman will then call the customer to explain the situation
If there is no problem for him  the sale is concluded  the factory is notified and a person in charge of planning will then contact the customer to find a delivery date and an installation date

For a normal file  non AVIQ   the client can either pay in cash when the work is completed  or pay it in monthly payment  when the work is completed  the client is billed 40% and the balance can be paid up to 11 times at 0% interest
If the customer says no  the factory is notified and they try to find another solution for the installation of the stairlift
If no other solution is found  the salesman will contact the customer again to explain
Either he accepts and the sale is concluded  or he cancels and the sale is cancelled
The store contains several kitchen expositions
First  the client enters into the store and the seller welcomes him and presents himself
It is a little competition between the sellers because they have to have a maximum of sales per month
The salesman makes a tour of the store with the customer in order to already know which style of kitchen pleases the customer
When the customer has chosen  he gives the measurements of his kitchen
Based on the measurements of the kitchen  the salesperson asks questions about what type of appliances  what type of sink and what type of mixer tap the customer needs
He then asks about the budget in order to know which type of furniture and which brand of household appliances can be put
Based on the measurements  the seller will look at how to arrange the kitchen plan according to the needs and space
Once the design has been drawn  the seller gives the price of the kitchen with all the discounts
The customer can then buy directly or think about it
If he buys  the payment is as follows  the customer pays a deposit of 30% with the order of the kitchen and the balance is paid before the delivery of the kitchen
If he decides to think about it  the customer is called again a few days later to find out his decision and whether any changes are needed
When the customer decides to order the kitchen  he signs the order form and a fitter is sent to the customer s home to check the measurements
If the measurements are not good  the kitchen is modified according to the measurements given by the fitter
If the kitchen needs a lot of work  the kitchen is redesigned and the customer is called because there is a risk of a price difference
It is a lot of work if the customer made wrong measurements
When everything is done  we give the technical plan to the customer and we send the order of the kitchen to the factory with the right measurements
We receive a confirmation from the factory and at that time  we ask the fitter to arrange with the client for an installation date based on the delivery date given by the factory
The fitter then installs the kitchen
If there are problems with a piece of furniture or measurements  the replacement part is recommended so that the erector can complete the kitchen
firstly  you have to know that the most used platform is Amazon and that you can reduce the delivery time if you are a premium member
The process begins when a customer want to buy something on line    for example  a candle
He will search for the article that he wants  when he has found he will be redirected to his basket  to confirm his order and to pay it
Then when the payment is made  the customer will receive a notification by email and the sales service will be notified too
The sales service will transfer the purchase order to the department  orders preparation
They will first check the availability of the product to reduce the quantity available online directly when the order is made
If it was the last candle available  the department orders preparation will notify it to the purchasing department and to the IT department
Like that  the first one can place a new order to have this article in stock again and the second department can delete the offer  on the Amazon website while waiting to receive the replenishment
when an order is placed in an orange box  it means that is still other items available in the warehouse and when it is placed in a blue box it means it was the last one available
When they have a shortage  they have to wait 5 days more to receive the item
When the order is done  the customer receive an email to say that a transporter will come to take the package and that they have to wait around 3 days to receive the order
The process finish when the customer has received his order in his letterbox or in his hand and that he has received an confirmation email
You begin by looking on internet flights tickets
For that it exists several websites as for example  Ryanair  Jetcost  Edreams  AirFrance
When you have found your destination and a good price  you book it online or by phone with a travel agency
Immediately  when the company has received the payment you receive an email and then  the company knows that they have to book a place in the flight for you
After that  you will have to find a hotel
You can search on Booking  which is the most famous website to book a hotel nowadays
Same  when it is done you have to pay  you receive an email to confirm your order and the hotel knows that they have to prepare your room
Then you have to prepare your suitcases
You can have 10kg per suitcase maximum
According to the time you will have to come to the airport you will ask to a taxi to come to your house 3h before  if it is an international fly  and 1H30 before if you stay in Europe
When you are in the airport you have to go first at the counter  to take your tickets

When it is done  you go to register your suitcases  In general  there are many people  so you have to do the line for 20 minutes  If when you arrive  you have more than 10kg in your suitcase  you have to take off some clothes and to redo the line for 20 minutes to check if you have 10kg
If not  you do it again until that you have the good weight
When your suitcase is registered  you have to pass security checks
Everybody has to do it no matter the flight that you take
It can take a lot of time according the airport where you are      30minutes
If you are in Brussels airport you have to wait during 40 minutes because it is the largest airport in Belgium and that they only have 5 machines to test everybody

After that according the time that you still have to wait  you can do shopping  but don t forget to be at least 15 minutes in advance to the boarding gates before your flight time  to be certain to not lose your flight
The process is done when you are in the plane
The Campus Recruitment organizes the  Career Night  on Wednesday  March 17 virtually due to the current health crisis
The process begins when the organizing team send the event link to the students of HEC Liège  Master 1  master 2 and alumni   either by email or on Facebook
Then the student clicks on the Career Center event link he received
The Career Center is a platform where there are a lot of job or internship offers  or events offered by HEC s partner companies
Then he is redirected to the Career Center page  and there he can either click on register  save or exit the page
If he registered to the event  the student receives an e mail with a confirmation that he is registered
Same if he just saved the event  he will receive an email
The team organizing the event receives a notification that someone has registered or had saved the event

If the student has registered on the Career Center  and only if!   he can now go on the platform where the event will take place by clicking on the second link provided to him on the email or on Facebook
The student can first creates his user account on the platform by clicking on  sign up  and then on  create user profile
The student can complete his profile  or he can do it later
The student can now register to the event  Career Night 2021  by clicking on it  and then on  register
One of the great features of this platform is that students can book interviews in advance
To book interviews in advance  the student can click on a slot with the time he wants to do the interview
Then  the recruiter has a notification that a student wants to meet
The recruiter can either accept or reject the appointment
The student will get an e mail with the confirmation  or not  that the interview is booked for the event
The insurance company takes care of the management of the unpaid invoices of our clients by their clients
One of the clients of the insurance company has an unpaid bill and ask the company to manage this file
The insurance company is notified and receives the file with the name of the debtor and all the information  amount due  etc
The debtor is the client who has not paid the client of the insurance company
The insurance company send a first reminder letter to the debtor with the details of the unpaid amount
The client receives a notification that the insurance company has taken over the file
If the debtor pays  the insurance company send the amount back to the client
Many debtors do not pay their debts immediately   other options should be considered
If the debtor contests the claim  the insurance company will initiate a dispute procedure
If the debtor says he has payment difficulties  the insurance company starts an installment plan in agreement with the client
If  after 10 days  the debtor has not given any news  the insurance company send a second reminder letter
If  after 20 days and the second reminder letter  there is no payment from the debtor  the insurance company initiates a legal procedure

Bpost is a public limited company which has two main activities  the processing of postal mail  and the management of a network of post offices which distribute postal products  financial products and insurance of subsidiary companies
The business process begins when a customer comes to their nearest Bpost office to send a registered letter
First  the customer take their ticket and waits their turn
Then  when called  he goes to the counter
Next  he chooses a type of registered mail by specifying the country of destination of the mail
For example  he can choose standard registered mail  or registered mail with additional insurance
Then  the Bpost employee gives the customer a dispatch slip to be completed
After that  the customer completes the dispatch slip by hand and gives it back to the employee
The Bpost employee encodes on the computer the data provided by the consumer on the dispatch slip
Then  the employee weighs the package
Next  the consumer pays for his shipment in cash  or by card
Afterwards  the employee gives the receipt as well as the proof of deposit to the customer and sticks the dispatch slip on the package
Finally  the customer can then track his package on the E tracking application
Bershka is a chain of ready to wear stores for men and women
The business process begins when the customer goes to the Bershka store to return an item ordered on the store s online platform
First  the customer walks into the store  and lines up
Then  he gives the cashier the items he wishes to return and presents the QR code attached to the purchase invoice
The cashier begins by scanning the label of the item to be returned
The cashier then scans the QR code
Afterwards  the cashier validates the item to be returned on the computer
finally  the cashier puts the item back on a hanger  attaches an anti theft device  and hangs it on the clothes rack
The cashier repeats this procedure for each of the items to be returned
Once all the clothes to be returned are validated on the computer and hung on the clothes rack with an anti theft device  the cashier submits a refund request
the customer inserts his bank card into the terminal and is reimbursed to the account used for the purchase
Finally  the refund is validated  and the proof of refund is printed and given to the customer

Booking completed

The process starts when the request of return is made on the website
The website receives a notification
The website creates a return label
Then the customer print the label
This later repacks the package
Then the person sticks the label on the package
The customer drops off this pack to the relay point
The relay point picks it up
It sends the package to the shop
The shops receives the pack

The student  called Emma  wants to apply for a scholarship for an exchange semester
To do this  she goes to the website of the organization and creates a profile
The student gives information about her name  age  education  origin  address  email address  phone number
The system of the organization receives the registration and the data
The system stores the data and sends back verification of the registration to the student s email address
The student logs in to the website and sees the required document for the application
The student uploads all the documents to the website
The system receives it and sends it forward to the evaluation committee  which has 3 juries
The evaluation committee has 2 months to decide about the validation of the student
Each of the evaluation committees needs to verify the document and can send the decision only after that
One of the evaluation committees needs to upload the decision to the system  which will automatically send it to the profile of the student
The system will send an email to the student s email address about the finalization of the decision as well
If the student is validated  the student needs to wait one month when she receives the money for the scholarship and the process ends
If the student is not validated  then she can require reconsideration and needs to wait another 2 months
If the student is validated for the second try  she needs to wait 1 month when she receives the money for the scholarship and the process ends
If the student is not validated for the second try either  she needs to accept the decision and the process ends
The process started when Tom opened the application and clicked on  Complaint
The system automatically opens another window
Tom needs to decide the category of his complaint
He can choose between the not delivered item or incorrect item or defective product or other
If the product is incorrect  he can choose between the wrong color or the wrong size or a different product or other
If the product is defective  he can choose between scratches or cracks  stains or discoloration  other
If the product is not delivered by the expected date  and the customer complains  the system will send automatically a notification to ask the customer to wait for 5 more days
The system saves this complaint request

If the product hasn t arrived after 5 days  and the customer asks for this complaint again  the system will send a notification that it will send the refund within 1 week  and the complaint process will be over
In any other cases  after choosing one of the options regarding the item  the customer will be driven to another platform where he needs to verify his claim by sending photos or videos of the item
After sending the asked documents  the system compares the ordered item to the received one  according to the picture video
If the system doesn t find similarity  it sends back a notification within 5 minutes  that the claim of the customer is valid and that the repayment process has started
The customer will receive his her refund within 1 week and the complaint process will be over
However  if the system did find similarity in more than 95%  the claim will be refused by the system and send a notification to the customer about it
The system offers further help  by recommending an assistant through the website
The customer can leave the complaint room  the process ended
