The following description is about public procurement  for high budgets  in the Belgian public sector
The process starts when a department of a public entity sends a request for supplies  a service or construction work
The public entity analyses the request and determines the department s needs
Then  the public entity creates a description of the need
After that  a budget is estimated  here  we only consider the case where the budget estimated is high
Then  the appropriate legal procedure of public procurement is chosen
After that  the public entity establishes the Contractual Requirements  chooses an official date for the opening of the public procurement and publishes a public procurement notice
When it is the official date  the public entity starts the public procurement procedure
The public entity analyses the offers from different suppliers
Then  the public entity chooses only one supplier
After that  the public entity writes a procurement contract notice  notifies the supplier chosen and writes a public procurement contract
The supplier delivers the supplies or service or carries out the construction work
Once this is done  the public entity verifies that everything is in order
If everything is in order  the supplier sends a bill to the public entity
If something is not in order  the supplier is notified
Then  the supplier fixes the problem
When the problem is fixed  the supplier sends a bill to the public entity
The public entity verifies if the bill is correct
If the bill is correct  the public entity makes the payment to the supplier and the public procurement contract ends
If the bill is incorrect  the public entity notifies the supplier
The supplier corrects the mistakes and sends a new bill
Then  the public entity makes a payment to the supplier and the public procurement contract ends
The following description s about how the Belgian Justice system makes the decision to investigate or not on a death
The process starts when a cadaver is found somewhere
A forensic doctor determines if the death is suspect or not
If the death is not suspect  a certificate of death is emitted  and funerals can be organised normally
If the death is suspect  a complementary analysis is done to determine if someone is involved in the death or not
If no one is involved in the death  then the death is due to natural causes or suicide
If the death is due to natural causes  a certificate of death is emitted  and funerals can be organised normally
If the death is due to a suicide  a small investigation takes place to confirm the suicide
If the suicide is confirmed  then a certificate of death is emitted  and funerals can be organised normally
If funerals can be organised normally  then the process ends
If the suicide is not confirmed  then someone is involved in the death
If someone is involved in the death  then a full police investigation is started
If the author is known  a magistrate decides if the Local Police or the Federal Judicial Police conducts the investigation
Then  the investigators determine the causes and circumstances of death
If the author is unknown  the Federal Judicial Police conducts the investigation
If the author can be identified  then the investigators determine the causes and circumstances of death
If the author cannot be identified  then the investigators make complementary research
The research could be international or not
After the complementary research  if the author is identified  then the investigators determine the causes and circumstances of death
If the author is not identified  then the murder becomes a  cold case
After determining the causes and circumstances of death  the investigation ends
Once the investigation is over  Judicial decisions concerning the author of the murder have to be made
All begins when the customer calls Ethias Assistance  the leading insurer in belgium  at 04 220 30 40
There  the insurance company identifies that the customer is not insured because they checked in their database that the customer was not registered
So the insurance proposes to the customer two solutions
Either the customer decides to do nothing so by this decision the process stops or the customer accept the sending of an SMS offering a paying service so by this decision the process continues
Just after that  the customer receives the sms and the customer clicks on the link in the sms and is sent to a platform   To access your troubleshooting solution  click here www assistanondemand com
On this platform  the customer enters his email address and creates his account
While he creates his account  the customer encodes the data allowing the troubleshooting with the place and time of intervention desired
For example   Rue de Londres  7  4000 Liège at 17h32
Then  he encodes his personal information and there will be a summary of the order  including the price proposal
At the end  it will be a secure online payment and there will be a confirmation of the order
The customer will receive the receipt of the details of the breakdown mechanic  his time of arrival and the delivery location of the vehicle to be repaired
The process finishes when breakdown service arrives
In the subscription process  there are several steps
The customer will first see the website Flora and two options is offered to him
Either  the customer is already insured with ethias so he can click on  calculate my price in 10sec  or he isn t insured with Ethias so he can click on  already insured elsewhere?
If he is insured elsewhere  Flora will give him also the option of  calculate my price in 10 sec
In other words  they will be both directed to the same buttom  calculate my price in 10sec

After that  Flora is going to ask the customer for which type of housing they want to be insured  on which floor there are situated  ground floor or 1st floor or more   what is his adresse and how much is his actual rent
It s only after this step that the customer can decide whether he takes the insurance or not
If he decides not to take it  then he doesn t have to subscribe and the process stops
If the customer decides to take the insurance  the process continues
If he continues  the customer will obtain a communication of the price  the summary of the coverage and the recommended option
Just after that  he will have a confirmation of wishes
He will then have to enter his contact details  surname  first name  date of birth  telephone  email  password  and there he will be able to connect to the App

Flora wil ask him other questions such as  are you already in your house?    are you already insurd for this adress?  If yes  the customer will be asked if he wants to change insurer  prodcedure to change
If no  he continues the process as normal
At the end  the customer will have to choose his payment method
It is a secure payment
He will receive a payment confirmation and the summary of the price and guarantees
Everything is done digitally  signature  payment  sending of the general conditions

A publishing process is recurrent in companies that publish books  newspapers  magazines and digital content
The process starts when the content writer takes up   finishes the first draft of an article
This draft includes descriptions of any custom images that are to be used in the article
Next  the content writer informs the marketer  editor and designer about the draft
The marketer gathers influencer contact information  which will be used for advertising once the article is finished
The draft will be sent to the editor  who proof reads the article and makes points on grammar  style  spelling  etc
Proof reading includes for example the checking of tenses in use
After the proof reading  the designer starts creating the custom images as asked  in Step 1  and sends them over again to the content writer
Next  the content writer takes the comments of the editor into consideration  fixes any mistakes and adds the images of the designer to the article
After this  the content writer sends the article to the SEO expert  who makes sure that the article meets the right optimization best practices and then publishes the article
The process ends after the marketer used a combination of advertising and email outreach to make sure that the article is read
When an intervention request is made by a customer  the service manager designates a technician to carry out the intervention
The technician  who performs the intervention  encodes his services on his service sheet  based on the intervention sheet
The intervention sheet allows the technician to enter the number of hours he works
The technician must send the service sheet to the service manager
The technician starts the intervention on the customer s machine
If  during the intervention  additional pieces of equipment are required  the technician sends the list of required equipment to the service manager
Otherwise  the technician continues the intervention and completes it
The service manager receives the technician s request
The service manager enters the required additional parts into a software program
The service manager picks up the necessary additional parts from the warehouse
The service manager sends the necessary additional parts to the technician
The technician receives the necessary additional parts
The technician continues the intervention with the additional parts sent by the service manager
The technician completes the intervention
Following a sales order  the service manager records a service order number
The service manager writes the order confirmation
The service manager completes the order lines with the material required for the service
The sales prices calculated for machine   installation   packaging   shipping needs to be clearly detailed
For example  if discount  deduct it from the price of the line s  concerned in the order
If the service manager has completed and confirmed the order  he enters the intervention in the Intervention Schedule
The service manager has 5 days to encode the intervention otherwise the customer service sends him a reminder
Then the service manager makes the necessary reservations for the intervention
He books the hotel
He reserves the rental car
He reserves the flights
When the reservations are made  the service manager makes sure that the necessary equipment is prepared
The service manager encodes in the lines of the order the prices related to the above mentioned reservations to be re invoiced
When the technicians are back  the service manager writes the final invoice according to the order  the intervention sheet  the service sheet
The service manager sends the invoice to the customer service department
The customer service receives the final invoice and sends it to the customer
The order is completed  the process is finished

The process starts when there is a claim intake received by the insurance s company
Then the company checks the claim s documents
For example  in case of car accident  people must provide driving license  certificate of insurance  certificate of technical inspection
If all the documents are valid  the claim is registered  otherwise documents are returned to client specifying what he has to provide
Then the claim is analyzed by the insurers who decide if the claim is accepted or rejected
If the claim is accepted  the insurers have to investigate its value  if it is rejected  a rejection message is sent to client
For a high value claim  client can expect to receive more money and his claim should be treated as a priority in comparison with low value claim
When the value is determined  the company can calculate the payment amount regarding a scale and notifies the client
After this  the client has to approve the damage payment or reject it and has to send his decision to the insurance company
If the damage s estimation is rejected  the insurance company calculates a new amount within 7 days and sends the proposition to the client
Once the payment s amount is accepted  the company schedules the payment and sends all the information to the client
At last  the company makes the payment to the client and closes the claim  the process is finished
The process starts when the accounting manager creates a new job requisition and posts it on the company s site

If the candidate responds favorably to the offer  the company sends him a summary and the employment form
The candidate sends back the employment form completed to the company
The company hires the candidate

Kinepolis is a company that owns several cinemas in Belgium which present all the new famous movies
The process starts when a customer enters the cinema and decides to watch a movie

When he goes to the employee  the employee asks how many tickets are needed

The different types of tickets allow people to pay a reduced amount in function of their status
The employee will ask for an identity card if there is a senior ticket asked

If the documents provided are appropriate then the employee prints the tickets
If the documents provided are not appropriate then the tickets are changed to normal tickets and are printed

If the payment is by card  the employee writes the amount on the machine and presents it to the client

Once the payment is accepted  the employee gives the tickets and shows where the customer should go
This ends the process
The process starts when the librarian receives the request for a book from the student

The book is available  the librarian sends an email to the student and gives him her 2 days to pick up the book and asks for a confirmation in return of this email indicating the day and time of his her visit
The librarian receives the confirmation email from the student and makes a textbook loan agreement in which the date of return of the book is mentioned
The student picks up the book and signs and dates it  the process stops

If the student has not sent a confirmation email and has not picked up the book  the librarian sends a reminder email and gives him her another 3 days  if within 3 days the student confirms and picks up the book  the process ends  if the student does not send the email and does not pick up the book  the process also ends
The book is not available and the university will be in possession of it at any moment  the librarian mails to say that the book is not available and asks him to wait for 3 weeks
The student maintains the request by sending a confirmation email  and the process resumes at step 2 after 3 weeks
If the book is in decline the librarian emails the student to notify him her that the book is in decline and the process ends

Boeuf Bourguignon is a great classic of french cuisine
The process starts with the cutting of the meat into large cubes
Then  cut the vegetables into small pieces
The basic vegetables of Boeuf Bourguignon are onions  carrots and celery
Sear the meat in a casserole dish
Add the vegetables
Stir and let cook for 5 minutes
Then  add some flour
The flour is a good ingredient
Add one bottle of red wine and some beef stock
Put the casserole in the oven for two hours at 160 degree celsius
Meanwhile  cook some mushrooms and some bacon in a pan
After two hours  add the mushrooms and the bacon to the preparation
Then  reduce the sauce over low heat for 20 minutes
The process ends when the meat is tender and the sauce is thickened
Boeuf Bourguignon is usually eaten with potatoes and caramelized onions
Vinted is an online platform with more than 30 million users where people can buy and sell used clothing
The process starts when the seller s wardrobe is overflowing
The seller then puts the items he wants for sale on the platform
The offer issued contains all kinds of information such as size  condition  brand  color  etc
Then  when a buyer wants to buy the item put online  there are two possibilities  either  he makes an offer to the seller for a lower price or  he buys the item at the price displayed in the ad
In the first case  the seller has the choice to accept or refuse the offer
If he refuses it  either the buyer or the seller can repeat another offer  or nothing happens and the process ends
If the seller accepts the offer or if the buyer buys the suit directly without making an offer  the money is transferred to the seller s online wallet and is blocked there
Then the seller receives a prepaid packing slip from Vinted
On this prepaid packing slip are mentioned the address of the buyer and the seller  the maximum weight of the package  etc
The seller has to pack the garment and stick this packing slip on it
The seller must then bring the package to a relay point within 5 days  otherwise the order is cancelled and the buyer is refunded
At this point  the buyer receives a notification and a letter informing him that the package is on its way
It takes between 3 and 5 days for the package to arrive at its final destination  another relay point
Once the package has arrived  both the buyer and the seller receive a notification that the package has arrived
The buyer must then pick it up within 7 to 14 days and confirm that everything is in order with the purchase within 4 days
If the buyer does not pick up the package within this period  the package is returned by the relay point to the addressee  after that  the order is cancelled and the buyer is refunded
If the buyer does not respect the deadline to confirm that everything is ok  the seller automatically receives the money without the seller being able to contest  and the order is then closed
When the confirmation from the buyer is positive  the seller receives the money in his online wallet and the order is closed
When this confirmation is negative  a dispute is opened by the buyer and the users then try to negotiate amicably
If they do not manage to find an agreement  they ask for Vinted s help which will decide and close the order
VD Horeca is a food wholesaler that supplies both private individuals and professionals

This secretary must then notify a storekeeper by phone so that he can prepare this order
If it is an order for a professional  the order is prepared on a pallet
If it is for a private individual  the order is prepared on a cart
The order can contain all kinds of products  drinks  fruit and vegetables  frozen products  preserves  etc
Once this order is completed and closed by the warehouse clerk  the order form is printed directly via the printer in the administrative department
If it is for a professional customer  the goods will be delivered the next day and the pallet is then stored in the warehouse
Deliveries start from 3am
If it s for a private individual  his cart is put at the entrance of the store in the fridge with his name on it
When the customer comes to pick up his order  the customer takes his cart and goes to the checkout to pay for his order  which completes the process
If the customer has not picked up his order within 3 days  the goods are put back on the shelf by a storekeeper and the order is cancelled
For deliveries  the driver leaves with the merchandise in the morning and drops it off at the customer s place with a delivery slip
When he comes back to the warehouse and confirms that everything has been deposited  the administrative department issues the invoice and sends it by mail courier to the customer
The customer pays into the account or in cash to the driver at the next delivery and the order is then closed

The process start with the periodic verification of stock levels by the stock controller
After stock levels has being verified by to stock controller  there are 2 possibilities
Either there is still enough stock to hold for the specific period of 1 month or it is realized that they are already beneath the safety stock levels

When the stock is under the stock level a memo is send simultaneously to the purchasing and sale department to inform respectively of the need of passing a new command and for the showroom to precise the requirement to take in terms of customers  demands
The purchasing department dress a list of materials to be command and send it to the finance department for treasury verification
After verifying the available cash in treasury  the financial department has 2 possibilities
If there is enough liquidity to support the operation  the finance department sends a note to the purchasing department validating the process or
If there is not enough liquidity to support the operation  the finance department sends a memo to the audit department for further analysis and validation of the treasury replenishing

After the operation of analysis has being done  the audit department sends a note to the finance department to replenish the treasury and the finance department send a note to the purchasing department after validating the process
Then an order is past to various suppliers in the data base for proforma
When all suppliers have send their proforma  the purchasing department receives it and choices the least economic cost
The purchasing department sends a copy of the least cost proforma to the finance department for the advanced settlement
After choosing the least cost within suppliers  the purchasing department validates the order to the lucky supplier and waits 2 week for the delivery to be received
A receipt note is send to the supplier by the purchasing department and
The finance department finalizes the settlement of the remaining debt after confirmation of the receipt by the stock department
The process start with the Control department checking employees presence
After employees presence  task done is verified by the Control department
The Control department dress a document then shift it to the human resource department for provision of personnel expenses
After the human resource department has prepared the available requirements for employees document they sends provisions to the finance department for treasury verification
After verification from the finance department there are 2 possibilities  either there is enough funds for the operation or not
If there is enough liquidity to support the operation  the finance department sends a note to the human resource department validating the process or
If there not enough liquidity to support the operation  the finance department sends a memo to the audit department for further analysis and validation of the treasury replenishing

After the operation of analysis has being done by the audit department  they sends a note to the finance department to replenish the treasury and the finance department send a note to the human resource department while preparing the required payment elements
The human resource then prepare public tax declarations and employees net salaries
After details has being made the human resource department finally transmits detailed documents to the Finance department
The finance department after receiving the documents starts by paying public taxes and messages are sent to employees 2 days after informing the beginning of the regularization of their situation

The WCO is a system of import controls  Import Control System  ICS   which aims to secure the flow of goods at the time of their entry into the customs territory of the EU

This control system is part of the Community Programme eCustoms  which requires operators to pass an Entry Summary Declaration  ENS  to the customs of the country of entry  prior to the introduction of goods into the customs territory of the European Union
Therefore   the process starts when the operator sends an ENS to the customs which must be send before the arrival of the goods in European customs union

In order to get exhaustive regulations and custom tariffs rates regarding their products  operator refer to the TARIC code and its database  which includes all applicable customs duties and all customs trade policy measures for all goods
When the goods arrive by any kind of freight such as train  sea  air  the customs must check physically the goods before it realease
To do so  operator are informed by email which sample of goods customs must verify based on the ENS and the hour gap when customs will come
Consequently  operator prepares the batch otherwise a penalty will be given therefore the warehouse staff is ordered to pull every goods needed and attach all the suitable documents
Then  certain goods are pulled over
The control can lead to 2 results
Customs can either seal an apporval or reject the declaration and keep the good
In this latter  the operator need to modify the declaration and pay more customs fees or send back the goods

This process is about a lean in a bank
The process starts when you contact your advisor
He will ask you to provide documents in order for the loan committee to review your case
If all documents required are sent  your bid goes through the loan committee  otherwise your advisor informs you of the missing documents
Once the missing documents are received  your bid can go through the loan committee
There is then three options
First case scenario  the committee agrees to loan you what you asked for and the process is finished
Second option  they refuse because you don t meet their requirements  the process is finished and you need to start a new process for a new loan
Third option  they give you some time to prove you will be able to pay the loan back  so you are back to the step just before the loan committee
Whatever the decision is  your advisor notifies you of the decision
The process is finished once you advisor notifies you the committee s final verdict is either the first or second option

The student who wishes to apply for this exchange program must pass the 5th semester and must have 12 20 or more in the average grade for the semester
The student shows his interest in the exchange project as soon as the home school opens the platform on which he   she can apply
If the student has missed the deadline  they cannot be pre selected

As the school administration collects the names of interested students and verifies their grade  it gives the final list of shortlisted students to one or two teachers who will be in charge and guide the selected students through the procedure
Teachers send an email to shortlisted students to inform them that they will have a meeting to explain in more detail the program and the available faculties and finalities

During the meeting  the teachers explain to the students the program and the subjects they will have at the foreign school  they answer their questions and also ask them to issue within the next 5 days a support certificate signed by the students and their parents or guardians
If the student does not deliver the signed certificate within 5 days  he will be excluded from the list
After handing over the contract  the students choose the finality they wish to study in the foreign school
Teachers must have a final list of 13 students or less
If teachers have 13 students or less  they send the list to the foreign school and ask the selected students to register themselves on the foreign school s website before the end of April
If the teachers have a list of more than 13 students  they organize a selection interview to select only the 13 best students
After completing the registration on the foreign school s website  the selected students must pass the 6th semester
If one of them does not pass  they can no longer go to the exchange program  and the process is done
After successfully completing the 6th semester  students begin to collect the paper they need to begin the process of obtaining their VISA
If one of the students has a missing document  he is notified to bring the document to the charged center  if he cannot provide the document  his request for obtaining the VISA is refused
Students who have obtained their VISA must send the tuition fees to the foreign school before the end of October
If they don t  they can t complete their enrollment  which means they can t come to school  and the process is finished
After submitting the tuition fees  the students begin to search for places and apartments in which they can live
After finding the place  the students books an airplane ticket to the foreign country

Finally  jewellery are stored in the good inventory

Ita is an Italian furniture fittings producer  which exports its products to North Africa

After registration  the accounts manager checks if the customer exists in their database  if not an email is sent to ask for the customer s business information VAT  address  person in charge

If the customer exists  the inquiry is sent to the inventory manager to check availability
After the inventory is checked a pro forma invoice with all necessary information  payment conditions  stock availability  incoterms  and sent to customer
The inquiry is valid for 15 days if no return is received the pro forma invoice is automatically canceled
If the customer confirms the pro forma invoice   a final invoice is sent to make payment
When payment is received the goods are delivered and the process ends

When the drinks are ready  the waiter brings them to the customer and then takes the food order
Finally  the waiter sends the food order to the kitchen and the ordering process is completed
First and foremost  it is important to know that building a house takes time and that the price of new construction has increased steadily over the past twenty years
The process begins when a client buys a piece of land to build on
The client then goes to an architect
The architect asks for the project specifications and gives a first approximation of the price based on the project
The client goes home
Maximum 2 weeks later  the architect sends by e mail to the customer the final project with the detailed estimate
If the project or the estimate is not suitable  the client returns to the architect
If the client is satisfied with the project and the estimate  he gives his approval to the architect
When the architect receives the payment from the client  he contacts the various building companies and organizes the construction site
The building companies are for example masons  roofers  tilers  carpenters  ceiling workers
Then he supervises that the timing and quality are good during the construction
Finally  the architect hands over the keys of the new construction to the client  the process is finished
The process starts when a customer switch on his computer and goes on the Internet
He can open a Chrome  Safari or Explorer page  it does not matter  the result will be the same
Then  he searches for the Amazon website
The customer writes  frying pan  in the research bar of the website
Then he compares the different goods suggested and their prices
He chooses the pan that he wants and adds it to his basket
He clicks on the  Order Now  button
He now either has to create an account or simply log in if he has already one
He enters its personal data such as his name  the address where the product has to be delivered  etc
The address can be someone s else address if he orders it for a friend for example
Then he proceeds to the online payment and receive a confirmation email
He will receive the pan 5 days later
If after 7 days he has not received anything yet  he will ask for a refund
John wants to bake brownies for his little brother s birthday
The process starts when he goes to the shop to buy all the necessary ingredients
He buys the ingredients  pays at the checkout and comes back home
His kitchen has just been painted in a brand new colour  he likes it a lot
He puts on his apron and washes his hands
First  he switches on his oven and set the heat to 180 degrees
He starts by weighting all his ingredients and prepare them in separate bowl
He breaks the eggs and adds sugar to it in a big bowl
Then he stirs both
He adds flour to the mix
He melts the dark chocolate then adds it to the batter
Again  he stirs everything with energy
He chooses the squared baking thin
He also has an animal shaped one but his brother is now too old for that
He pours his mix into the baking pan and puts it in the oven
After 15 minutes  he gets his brownies out of the oven and lets it cool down
After half an hour  he offers them to his little brother and eat them together
The customer starts the process by choosing his order on the Uber Eats platform  Uber Eats is a delivery service for food delivery in a  fast food  restaurant
Then  the customer pays via a banking application and once the payment is made  a message is sent to the restaurant that will start preparing the customer s order

Simultaneously with the preparation of the order  Uber Eats will appoint a delivery person for the order and once the order has been prepared  the delivery person will take receipt of the order and begin delivery
Then  a notification is sent to the customer stating that the delivery person has taken receipt of the order and indicates a delivery time
Uber Eats delivery people are private individuals who can decide their own schedule
Once arrived  a message is sent to the customer who will pick up his order
And finally  once the delivery is completed  the customer is invited to note the delivery and the process is thus completed
The customer designates a destination on a certain date  as well as the place of departure
Then  Blablacar will put this person in contact with other travelers who will make a similar journey and a person who will also make the journey with his car
The different travelers will contact each other to define the exact meeting place
And once the time of departure  the different people will meet and start the journey
We can note that a good behavior and a good mood will allow everyone to have a good trip
Once arrived at the destination  the different people will say goodbye
Respecting the rules of the road is important so that all these peopleare at their destination safe
The different passengers will be invited to write down their journey and the different passengers will have to make the payment within 48 hours after the end of the trip
This money is needed to pay part of the gas  tolls    for example
Finally  the driver will receive the different payments from the passengers and the process will be completed
The Campus Recruitment HEC is a NPO inside HEC Liège
The process of registration starts with our event team sending the invitations to all companies two months before the event date
The invitation email contains a link to a form collecting necessary and useful data for the registration and the invoicing
When the company receives the email  it can register itself on the form and their registration is recorded inside a form response file
If the company did not register itself  a reminder is sent 30 days after the sending of the invitations  a second reminder is sent 15 days after the first reminder
Reminders contain the same information than in the invitation e mail
The event team check every two days if there are new registrations in the form response file
If there is a new registration  they verify the data provided
If it is complete  a confirmation e mail is sent to the company and the company is registered as confirmed
If there is a missing piece of information  an email is sent to the company and the registration is on hold until the information is received
One month before the event  the event team starts to send the personal links to the online platform where the event takes place to the companies which are confirmed
The registration process ends the day before the event
All registrations on hold are cancelled
The process starts with the sending of invitations to companies by the event team
Companies register with an online form
Registrations are recorded in the form response file
The file is accessible to every team
The accounting department check every week if there are new registrations
When there is a new registration  the accounting department start by verifying if all the necessary data for the invoicing is available
Necessary data is in the second part of the online form and is often  partially  missing
If all the data is available  an invoice is created and sent
If data is missing  an e mail is sent to receive the missing data from the company
If nothing is received a reminder is sent every 7 days
If nothing is received the day before the event  the registration is cancelled
If the information is received on time the process continues
Once the invoice is created and sent  the payment is due
If the payment is not received a reminder is sent every week
For example every Monday
If the payment is not received the day before the event  the registration is cancelled
Once the payment is received the form response file is updated
If the registration is cancelled  the accounting department send a notification to the event team and the form response file is updated
The process ends when all payments are received
ZARA is a textile brand that deals in online and in store sales of different categories of clothing and fragrances for men  women  children and home furnishings
The process starts when the customer logs on to the website or the shop s application
The customer then selects the item and places it in the shopping cart
The website redirects the customer to the payment method
The customer selects their payment method either before delivery or after delivery
Once the payment has been validated  the shop prepares the order
The order is sent either to  DHL or LA POSTE  or directly to the customer
The order leaves the warehouse of DHL or the post office for delivery
The customer receives the order
Then checks the quality of the order or returns it and the process starts again or gets a refund
Once the quality is validated he validates the Payment end of the process
SNCB is a travel agency that offers travel services for citizens to different destinations by train

then they select their direction or get on the train if they have a travel pass
online the customer is redirected to the payment
The customer selects their method of payment either by bank transfer or by Bank contact at the counter
Once the payment is validated the travel agency generates an electronic or physical ticket
A train controller from the agency validates the ticket
He travels to the destination
Arriving at the destination the process ends
The process start when student  makes a research for a company  who needs an intern

The student sends the document required for the internship

The student takes an interview appointment
the student passes the interview

The student signs the contract between company  student  and their university

The student starts the internship  the process is finished

if student is allowed the admission  jury sends the admission letter to the student by email  the process is finished
Colruyt group is a food retail chain which also offers a service called  click and collect  for shopping in their supermarket
The process starts when a customer makes an order on Corluyt s website
The order is paid by card directly on the website at the last step of the order
Colruyt employees are notified of the order made by the customer
An employee is in charge of preparing the order list
For example  a bottle of Cava  some biscuits  vegetables and a frozen pizza
An employee puts the order in the fridge
For instance the frozen pizza is kept in a freezer and vegetables are also kept at good temperature in a fridge
Then  the customer comes to the shop at the pick up point
The customer asks for its order
The Colruyt employee gives the respective order to the customer
The customer takes its order  leaves the shop and the process is finished
Deliveroo is a food delivering company operating in different countries such as Spain  Italy and Belgium
The process starts when a customer makes an order on Deliveroo s application
For example  a pizza with peperoni in a Italian restaurant
Deliveroo s employees are notified by the order on the company s platform
An employee accepts to be in charge of the order
At the same time  the restaurant where the order is made  is also notified of the order
The restaurant prepares the order asked by the customer
During the preparation time  the employee drives to the restaurant
The employee picks up the order
At the same time  the customers is notified that the order has been picked up by the Deliveroo s employee
The employee drives to the customer s address
During this time  the customer checks the arrival time of the deliveryman on the application
For example a waiting time of 9 minutes before the arriving of Deliveroo s employee
The employee notifies that he is in front of the customer s door
The customer takes its order and the process is finished
Meti is a small steel company  which produces metal sheets
The process starts when a client submits an order by mail
The technical service department cheeks the order and determines if the request is feasible or not
If it is not feasible  the process ends by sending a rejection email to the customer
If the request is feasible  the technical service department makes a quote and sends it to the client

In any case  whether the order is rejected or not   the mail is sent to the customer service department and this department creates a fil in the software with the information of the client and his request
This software used is SRD
If the client rejects the quote  the customer service department closes the file
If the client accepts the quote  the accounting department creates the invoice while the production department starts to make the order
After that  when the production department has finished the order  the accounting department notifies the client and sends the invoice
Finally  the client picks up the order and the process is finished when the invoice is paid
Stia is a small steel company  which produces metal sheets
The process starts when the production department informs about the needsto purchase goods to finish an order
The head of the workers transmits it to the technical department who request a quote from a supplier and sends it to the accounting department
There are two accountants and one secretary in the company
Then  this department checks the company s accounts and if it is possible to buy the goods
If they refuse the request  they send a rejection by mail to the technical department who restarts the process by asking another quote from a supplier
If the request is accepted  they tell it to the technical department who makes the order with the supplier
After receiving the invoice  the accountant pays a deposit and waits that the goods arrive to pay the rest
Finally  the goods arrive in the company and are given to the production department
The process ends with the payment of the whole invoice
The process starts when a customer calls or send a mail to the company
An employee takes information of the location of the future work to be done
A worker goes on site to take some measurements and to ask the type of insulation needed
Customer tells work to be done and details
Quote is made and sent to client
Client accepts the quote
Worker goes back to workshop and produce the insulation covers
On site worker installs all insulation and covers
Customer comes and check finished work on site
Invoice is created
Confirmation of checked work is sent to office
Invoice is sent to customer
Customer pays for the work done and checkout the invoice
The process is over
The process starts when the client goes to the driving  school
An employee will register the client with his personal information and ask for payment about 1100€
When the payment is done  the client will follow 12 hours of theorical courses in a week
After this week  when he s ready to pass his theory examination  he is going to take an appointment in a driving exam center
The day of the exam  he will pay 15 € and pass the exam
The person can pass this exam as many time he succeed
After it  he will contact the Driging school to schedule his practical courses
He will follow 20 hours of thoses cources with a driving instructor
After it  if the is able to drive alone  the instructor will provide him the L and a paper which allows him to get provisional licence card to be ordered at the municipality
If he s not  til he ll be able to drive alone he will follow 6 hours more of practical course with additional fees
Then the client have 18 months to pass his final practical exam
But first he has to take an appointment in the exam center to pass the perception test
The test cost 37€ and has to be paid before the test  the client has 2 chance to succeed if not have to follow again 6 hours of practical course
After succeeding this test we take an other appointment for the final driving test
The process is finished went the instructor deliver the final paper which allows him to get his driving licence card to be ordered at the municipality
The process starts when the customer buy special item
The designer check if she has the item in the stock
If yes  put it in a box  go to the post to send it and the process is finished
In the other case she will send an e mail to the customer to notify that the delivery time will be longer than it supposed  around 5 days more
She ll buy all parts required for the manufacture of the item  max 2 days
After it she brings it to the clothing workshop
The clothing maker and the designer will negotiate a price and a delay during which the item has to be ready
If the designer is satisfied  she will pay the maker
She will put it in a box  go to the post to send it and the process is finished
If she is not satisfied  they will work together to manufacture the item and she will pay a part of the basic price
To finished the designer will put it in a box  go to the post to send it to the customer
There are different articles offered by the photo service such as posters  mural decoration  postal cards  calendars
The process starts when the customer clicks on the basket shopping icon after having chosen the format of his pictures
He s redirected to a page on which Media Markt asks him to download pictures from his social networks or from his computer
After adding the pictures  the client has to select the format  the type of paper and the quantity each picture will be printed
He can also modify the pictures if he wants to crop the picture  add an effect
When he clicks again on his basket shopping after all the modifications  he s redirected to the summarizing page with all his items  showing the total price and quantity
The client can add a promotion code or delete his order
If he chooses to continue with the payment  he has to choose the shipping mode  to pick up his order in a Media Markt store or they will deliver his order at home
In each case  the customer has then to encode all the data for the billing or connects himself to the website if he already has an account
Then after verifying all his personal details encoded  he confirms the order by clicking on the button  pay
The customer chooses his preferred type of payment  online obligatory  and pay
Once the order is finalised  Media Markt sends an email to confirm the order to the customer
Media Markt prints the pictures and packed them
Then they send it to the DPD that will be in charge to deliver the order at the customer s address if he chose this option
Otherwise  the customer goes to the store  asks his order at the service customer desk  that asks to sign a reception paper and gives the package
This is how the process ends
Carrefour Market next to my home is my favorite store because it is easy to recognize where I can find my articles
Since we re still under the Covid conditions  I have to the grocery shopping for my sister and I alone
I drive to the supermarket and park my car
Then I put a mask on my face and look for a coin to get my trolley
At the entrance of the supermarket  I disinfect my trolley and my hands
I do all my grocery shopping  trying to respect the 30 minutes allowed and check my list of items

When I finish to get all the articles I needed  if I have less than 10 articles  I use the self scan but if I have more  I m waiting in the line for the cash registers  which is more usual as I tend to not go back every time to the supermarket
When I see a free cashier or one calls me  I put all my articles on the conveyor belt
The cashier scans all my articles while I put them into a bag
The cashier asks if I have a loyalty card if I didn t show it before and scan it
Then  I proceed to the payment by cash or with credit card
The cashier gives me back the change if I paid by cash and it wasn t the right amount  then hands me the bill
I go back to my car  put my bags inside it and then put back the trolley at its place
Finally  after having disinfected my hands with my personal sanitizer gel and removed my mask  I leave the parking and return home
The business process starts when the customer enters the snack
O Tacos is a snack that offers French tacos
The customer makes the order at the counter
The cashier takes the order  and he encodes the order on the computer
The system notifies the order to the kitchen
The client pays
The client gets the receipt and gets a device that will ring when the order will be ready
The device is round and black with the logo of the snack on it
The client gets a seat at a table and waits for his order
The client choose his table  on the first or second floor
The cook prepares the meal
The device rings to notify that the meal is ready
The client goes to get his order and comes back with the meal at his table
The client leaves after finishing his meal and the process is finished
The process starts when a student sends his documents to the Allocations d Études   Fédération Wallonie Bruxelles to get a grant
He either does it via post or the internet for example
It is easier to do it via the internet
When the Allocations d Études   Fédération Wallonie Bruxelles receives the documents  an administrator is assigned to the student
The administrator can be a man or a woman
The administrator analyses the documents
If nothing is missing  he closes the case and sends the decision to the student
If some documents are missing  the administrator sends and email to ask for the missing documents
The student has 30 days to respond
If he does not respond within 30 days  he is notified that his case is closed  and he will not receive a grant  the process is finished
When the student sends the documents within 30 days  the administrator checks the documents
The administrator communicates the answer through postal mail to the student
If it is a negating answer  the student is notified that he will not receive a grant and the process is finished
If it is a positive answer  the student is notified that he will receive a grant and how much he will receive
When the student receives his grant  the process is finished
The grant can vary from 400 to 5000 euros

The platform shares the schedule of the monitor in a new page
The student selects the slot timetable
He can change the visualization of the schedule  calendar   by day or by week
He encodes his personal information and responds to a few questions
The last step for the student is to proceed with the payment of the course
When the course is booked  a message is sent to the tutor with all the information
The process ends when the tutor validates the course
Lea and Lara are hungry and want to eat a sandwich during the lunch pause
The process starts when Lea calls  Poivre   Sel

Lea and Lara take the car to drive to the restaurant  Poivre   Sel
Meanwhile  the waiter at  Poivre et Sel  prepares the sandwiches

La Coccinella  is a pizzeria located in Visé  in the province of Liège  and is open every day from Tuesday to Sunday
The business process starts when a customer calls the pizzeria to take an order
The phone rings at the pizzeria and an employee pick up the phone
The employee asks the order to the customer
The customer tells his order and the employee write down the order at the same time
For example   I would like a 4 Cheese pizza  2 Margarita pizza s and 1 Bolognese pizza please
Then the employee tells the customer at what time he can pick up his order at the pizzeria and asks him its name
For example   You can pick up your order at 7 15 pm

The pizza chef prepares the order
The customer goes to the pizzeria

End of the process
Visé voyages  is an independent travel agency in Visé  in the province of Liège
The customer enters the agency
The employee takes charge of the customer and the customer sit at the desk
The employee asks him its preferences
For example   I would like to go Madagascar with my wife between July 20 and August 15 for 2 weeks
For example  I would like a 5 star hotel  with a private beach and at least one swimming pool
I have an unlimited budget
The employee looks for different hotels on his computer and shows them to the customer
Either the customer likes a hotel or not
If the customer does not like any hotel  the employee can give him catalogs to look by himself or not  and he leaves the travel agency
The business model is over
If the client likes a hotel  he asks the employee to book it
The employee asks the client some personal information
For example  he asks its name  ID card  address  birthdate     Example sentence
The client gives his personal information and the employee filled out the booking form
The client signs the booking form
The client pays a deposit by card or by cash
The employee gives documents to the client with the booking confirmation

The employee gives further information about the final payment and ask the client how he will receive the travel documents  either he comes to pick up its documents in the travel agency  or he receives them by mail
The client tells his preference
The client leaves the agency
This is the end of the business process
Colruyt is a Belgian supermarket chain

Concerning the cash desk  the process starts when a client arrives with his trolley at the cash desk  they have to let their  full  trolley next to an empty trolley that is already standing at the cash desk
The cashier enters then his personnel number on the screen next to him and say hello to the client
The cashier also asks the client if he has his Extra card or discount vouchers  if the client has them  the cashier needs to scan them and has to put the vouchers in a special drawer
However  it is not necessary that the cashier scans the card and the vouchers before scanning the articles  he can scan them while scanning the articles
The cashier scans the products that are in the client s trolley
Once the products are scanned  the cashier can hear a sound to confirm it is well scanned and the cashier has to transfer them in the trolley that was empty when the client arrived at the cash desk
The cashier usually scans the barcode or the QR code standing on the product for example

However  concerning fruits and vegetables that are in bulk  the cashier needs to put them in the scale and type the number associated with the fruit on the screen  for example  ‘2929  is the number of trusses of tomatoes while ‘55  is the number of tomatoes without trusses
There is a little notebook under the screen with a list of the fruits and vegetables and their associated numbers to help the cashier
When the scale has weighted the fruits and vegetables well  the cashier will hear a sound to confirm that it is weighted

When the cashier is not able to scan the barcode or to find the fruit s number  he has to make a call to a colleague to help him  the colleague he will call depends on the department from where the product is  for example  the ‘fridge room  or the shop  and from where his colleagues are working at that moment
For example  if the product the cashier doesn t find the barcode is from the fridge room  he will call a colleague that is working at that moment in the fridge room to ask for the product number
There is a schedule which is displayed at the checkout where you can see who is in which department and at what time
The cashier transfers all the products to the trolley that was empty at the beginning
the cashier clicks on the screen on the button ‘Finished
If something is remaining in the scale  a popup will appear on the screen  preventing the cashier from accessing the payment screen
If nothing is remaining in the scale  the window of the cashier screen will close
Then  the cashier will invite the client to follow him to another screen in order to pay
The cashier will enter his personnel number again and will tell the client the amount of money he has to pay
Then  he will select on the screen whether the client pays with his card  restaurant ticket or cash
The cashier will encode the amount that the customer pays  depending on the means of payment
When all the amount is paid  the cash drawer will open and the receipt will be printed automatically
The cashier will close the cash drawer  give the receipt to the customer and say goodbye
Finally  the customer leaves the shop with his shopping trolley  the process is finished
Amazon is an e commerce website where you can find everything you want to
When a client wants something  he  type the name of the item in the search bar
Then  the client will be proposed a multitude of products related to what he has written in the search bar
Afterwards  the customer clicks on an article he likes and click on  add to basket  if he wants to buy it
He will be proposed complementary items to the item he has chosen
for example  if he buys a coffee machine  he will be offered to buy the capsules that go with it
Then  he will have the opportunity to either continue his purchases or to click on  place the order
If the client decides to place the order  he will be asked his personal information  name and address for the shipment
Also  he will be asked how he wants the parcel to be shipped  fast or normal service
Finally  the customer will have to pay
When the payment is confirmed  the client will receive an email of confirmation with the date at which the parcel is supposed to arrive

Then  Amazon gives the parcel to a distributor which will deliver the parcel to the client while the client will have the opportunity to track his parcel in order to know where the parcel actually is for that moment
Finally  the client receives his parcel and the process is finished
Colruyt Group is a Belgian supermarket company
This supermarket also offers a drive in service to pick up shopping ordered online
The process starts when the customer logs in to their MyColruyt application
Colruyt analyses customer preferences and offers recipes in its application along with the products needed to prepare them
The shop also compares the prices of its competitors in order to set its prices as low as possible and to offer advantages with its Xtra card
The customer makes his shopping list on his app

Then he chooses a collection point  a collection date and makes the payment
This saves him time and frees up some time in his schedule

Once this is done  the worker drops the package off at the collection point selected by the consumer

The customer then goes to the collection point and picks up their shopping list
The recipes selected by the customer are ready to be made with love
This year  Mrs Tartauxpommes is celebrating her 25th birthday and decides to organise a party to gather her close friends for the occasion
However  as we are in the midst of the COVID 19 health crisis  she can only invite 10 of her friends to the party
The process begins when guests receive an invitation to a birthday party 1 month before the date
In order to select her guests  Mrs   Tartauxpommes had to choose the friends she really wanted to see on her 25th birthday

She chose some long time friends such as Mr   Tartauxpoires and Mrs  Tarteauxcersies  but also some friends she has not seen for a long time and with whom she has a good relationship such as Mrs  Gateauchocolat and Mr  Tarteauriz
A few days before the big day  Mrs Tartauxpommes goes to the supermarket to buy food and drink for her guests
She also rents a tent in her garden so that she can host them outside
The day before  she takes the time to create garlands with cardboard  paint and balloons and other decorations in order to put the finishing touches to the event
Meanwhile  all the guests get together to buy her a present  they give her a parachute jump
The big day arrives  and all the guests go to their host s house
They eat  drink and party to Spanish music
Mrs Tartauxpommes is very happy and has a wonderful 25th birthday
Marbaise is a shoe shop but it also sells some clothes
The process starts when the customer enters into the shop
A seller notifies that a customer has entered
The seller asks the customer if he needs help
The customer asks to the seller for the pair of shoes he is looking for  such as a pair of Nike shoes in size 42
The customer tries it on if it is available in the shop  otherwise the employee goes to the stockroom to check if there are any left  Marbaise has a big stockroom to store a lot of items
If there is a pair of shoes left in the shop s stock  the customer tries them on  otherwise the employee tells the customer that there are none left and the customer leaves  the process is over
If the pair of shoes does not fit  the customer leaves and the process is over and if it fits  the employee scans the shoe box to register it in the cash register
The customer pays at the checkout and leaves with the shoes  the process is fulfilled
TUI is a well known travel agency in the Verviers region and is located in the city centre
The process starts when the customer enters into the travel agency
The customer expresses the travel characteristics he is looking for to the employee

The employee encodes them in the computer in order to obtain trips that correspond to the customer s request  TUI has a very competent computer system that makes it possible to compare all the different travel offers
The employee prints out the different travel options and offers them to the customer
Either the customer decides directly and makes a choice on the spot or he leaves the agency and comes back when he is decided  this can be a few days later or even 1 or 2 weeks later
When the client has decided  the travel agency books the trip for the client
The client pays a deposit or the whole trip to confirm the booking
The agency employee prints out the booking confirmation and gives it to the client
The customer leaves when he has received the confirmation and the process is finished
Tartiflette   is a French recipe  ideal for sharing with family and friends after a dav of skiing
The process starts when you start to get hungry for a good  Tartiflette
You must first preheat the oven to 200 degrees
Then peel the potatoes  dice them and pre eook in a pan of salted boiling water for 5 10 minutes
In the meantime  fry an onion In a pan with a Iittle fat
Once the 5 10 minutes are up  put your potatoes in the pan with the onion and brown them
Once they are golden  add the lardons and finish cooking them
Meanwhile  cut the Reblochon in half
To make it runnier  it is better to cut it in the direction of the thickness
Spread your potato and lardon mixture in a casserole dish and cover it with the Reblochon cheese
Then put your dish in the oven
After 20 minutes of cooking  take your dish out of the oven and enjoy it

Finally you have to think about the decorations and the process is over
The customer needs to be insured
Customer send insurance request to the insurance company
Insurance seller receive the insurance request from the customer
Insurance seller read the customer s request
Insurance seller check if the request is a standard one
If it is  he prepares standard terms provisions
If it is not  he prepares special terms provisions
At the same time  the risk analyst has to analyze the customer s risks
For example  based on previous car accidents  age  number of years of experience  etc
Then  the insurance seller prepares the contract  terms  premium to pay  etc
The insurance seller sends the contract to the customer
The customer receives the contract
The customer reads the contract and his terms
If the customer accepts the contract  he sends an acceptance letter
The process is completed
If the customer refuses the contract  he sends a rejection letter
The process has failed
Student needs an internship
Student sends his application to the company
Human resources department of the company receives the application
Human resources department check student s application
For example  his skills  practical experience  interests
If HR department decides to refuse  it sends a rejection notification to the student  the application has failed
If HR department decides to accept  it sends an acceptance letter to the student
Student sends the internship convention to the HR department
HR department sign the internship convention
HR department sends the signed internship convention to the student
Student receives the signed internship convention by the company
Student send the internship convention to his University
The university receives the internship convention signed by the company
The university signs the internship convention
The university sends the internship convention signed by both parties to the student
The application is completed
The University sometimes need student tutors for some courses
When a new student tutor is needed  the assistant in charge of the selection process firstly spots the students who passed the exam with a very good grade
The assistant decides which student they want to contact
The assistant sends an email to the potential candidate to offer them the job
The student might ask for some time to think about the job offer
In that case  they can have a one week delay to make their final decision
If the student does not answer or rejects the offer  their application is cancelled and the process starts again with the assistant having to spot another candidate
If the student accepts the offer  the assistant sends them the application form
The student fills in the application form and sends it back to the assistant with a copy of their ID and a  Student@Work  certification
The  Student@Work  certification is a document from the Belgian Government which ensures that the student has not exceeded the amount of hours they can work as a student
The professor in charge of the course signs the application form of the student tutor candidate
Once it has been signed by the professor  the necessary documentation is sent by the assistant to the Human Resource Department of the University
The Human Resource Department makes the official contract  prints out two copies and sends them both by post to the student
When they have received the official contract  the student signs both copies
The student then keeps one copy and sends the other to the assistant
The selection process is thus over as the student has their official student tutor contract
The process is an order to cash process in a very small engineering and industrial design enterprise
The process starts when the company receives a price request for a metallic structure
If the client gives enough information about their need  the company prepares a quote directly
If information is not sufficient or if the client demands a visit  the engineer goes on site first  and then prepares the quote
The quote is sent by email to the client
The client can either accept the quote or refuse it
If they refuse  the process is cancelled
Once the quote was accepted  the engineer designs and computes the structure
When the structure calculations are ready  the company sends them to the client for approval
If the client is not satisfied with the structure design or calculation  the engineer adapts it and sends it back to the client
When the structure is approved  the company sends the plans to its subcontractor for production
The company does not produce itself and outsources both production and delivery
Meanwhile  the company prepares the invoice
When the subcontractor finishes the production of the metallic structure  it informs the company and then delivers the structure to the client
The company sends the invoice to the client and waits for the payment
If the client has not paid within the payment terms  the company sends a reminder to the client
When the client pays  the file is closed and the process ends
After researching the different properties  we select one that corresponds to our search criteria
We contact the seller or the real estate agency for a first visit of the property
Before the visit  we make a pre analysis with the data we have on the property
On the day of the visit  we identify the elements that could be problematic  for example it could be signs of humidity  or walls or ceiling recently repainted
After the visit  we deepen the analysis with quantitative data such as the amount of rents  the taxation of the building  etc
If any renovation work needs to be done  we request a second visit accompanied by an architect or an expert to budget the amount of work

Before making an offer to the seller  we contact the bank to check if the purchase is feasible  then we do some administrative research with the land registry and the administration to check if the building is in urbanistic order or if rental permits are required
After the positive decision of the bank and have had the administrative information  we make an offer to the seller with  if necessary  the amount of renovation to be done to justify a lower price
If the offer is accepted  we communicate it to our solicitor who takes over to take all the legal information and prepare the legal documents
After all the administrative and legal research  the transaction is ready
We meet the seller s solicitor with the seller to finalise the transaction by signing the legal deed
If the offer is not accepted  we increase the offer until we reach the limit price fixed beforehand during the financial analysis
The process is completed

Before proceeding to any analysis  we check that the parameters such as the level of oil  salt or spices are optimal and then check if the injection settings of the raw materials are at the right values
For example  X gram of salt injected per minute or X ml of oil injected per minute
At each defined time interval  take a sample during production
Bring the sample to the analysis laboratory
The sample of chips must be mixed to get a powder
Separate the mixed sample into two portions
The first part of the sample will be mixed with a first chemical liquid solution and then passed through a measuring device
The machine measures the sodium content
It takes five minutes for the device to deliver a series of parameters
These parameters must be transcribed on a record sheet
The second sub sample can now be mixed with another liquid solution and analyzed by another device that will determine other nutritional parameters
The result of this analysis should also be recorded on a record sheet

If a value of the two analyses is out of the range of values established by the quality department at the beginning of the production  the production manager and the quality department must be immediately informed in order to modify the parameters of the production machines
If no anomaly is detected  the analyses continue at regular and defined intervals until the end of production
The complete production record is given to the quality manager at the end of the production cycle

The process began when I saw a post on a Facebook page about an internship opportunity within a digital agency known as  Saga Communication  in Morocco

After a week of waiting for a response  I received a phone call from the company s digital marketing manager  who asked me two questions

The same day  I received an email from the digital marketing manager  where she acknowledged my email  she told me to wait for another email from the human resources manager to inform me of the day of our meeting

The process starts when a stationery store receives an order from a customer with a call phone  the employee notes the order on the computer
Then the same employee searches for available and unavailable products based on the order
Then  the employee emails the customer a document with all available items and waits for the answer
After 48 hours  if the answer is not received  the employee calls the customer
If there is still no answer  the order is cancelled  and the employee informs the customer
The customer has two options
He cancels his order or accepts an order with the available products or adds new items to his order
In this case  the process restarts as it is considered a new request
In case an order is accepted  the employee starts collecting the order
Once the collection is done  the employee informs the customer to proceed with the payment  either in cash or by bank transfer
When the payment is received  the employee completes the order by sending a receipt to the customer  the customer waits 48 hours for the delivery  if the delivery was not made in time  we refund
1 day before the scheduled delivery time  the employee sends an email to the customer to confirm that the order has been sent
The process ends once the order is received by the customer

A tax consultancy company wishes to recruit young graduates
After an application has been received  an HR employee verifies that the required competence criteria are met
If the criteria are not met  the process ends by sending an automated customized rejection to the applicant
If they are met  the candidate takes knowledge tests
If the test is not passed  the process ends by sending an automated customized rejection to the applicant
If it is passed  the HR employee coordinates an interview between the applicant and his potential future colleagues
The questions asked will be designed to discover the candidate s personality and work methods
As soon as the interview has been conducted  the interviewers debrief it
If they decide that the candidate s profile is not suitable for the vacant position  the process ends by sending an automated customized rejection to the applicant
If they decide that the profile is suitable  the HR employee creates an employment contract and sends it to the applicant
A payment service company must establish a process to fulfill its legal obligations
When a customer requests to open an account  a request for information is sent to the customer to verify his or her identity
Among the elements requested  a copy of the identity card is demanded
If the customer refuses  the account is not opened
If the customer complies with the request for information  the account is opened
When the account is opened  the degree of risk and the nature of the business relationship is assessed
If the assessed risk is low  the profile will be assessed again after 6 months
If the assessed risk is high  continuous vigilance must be carried out on the client s various transactions
Within the framework of this continuous vigilance  if atypical operations with regard to the client s profile are detected  a request for justification is notified to the client
If the client responds appropriately  the transaction is carried out
If this is not the case  the transaction is not carried out and a suspicion report is notified to the authorities
The purpose is to enable state authorities to investigate the client s activities if the elements provided are conclusive

The research department analyses the opportunities on the market and the possibilities of realisation at a technical level
For example if there is a lot of competitors or if the market decrease
The research department produces a report sent to the marketing department mentioning the opportunities and threats
The marketing department validates the project  for the factory if the recommendations are good or the process stops if the innovation is too risky
The factory will develop the product on small series
We can estimate it at one hundred for the first step
The factory send it back to the research department for testing
The research department will test the product in real conditions with a panel of consumers on taste  packaging and price
The research department produces a report mentioning the points to be improved on the products
The report is sent to the factory and to marketing for review
The factory change the packaging for green to pink and add nuts in the product
After revision  if everything is validated  the design department validates the project
The product is sent to the trade marketing department
The trade marketing department develop a sale plan and placing it on the shelves of supermarkets
The trade marketing send the plan to the supermarket for validation
If it is validated the product is marketed and sold in France
The marketing department sends its innovation idea to the research department by mail in a document

The process starts when the wooden furniture manufacturer receives an order which indicates the size and measurement required for a particular design of a certain type of furniture
The manufacturer must choose the right piece of wood in terms of shape  size  and species according to the order
Then  it is the step concerning the wood cutting and the equipment used depends on the size and shape required by the order
A panel saw will be used if it needs light  small  and straight cuts
A CNC machine will be used if it needs to cut from a huge and heavier piece of wood or if it needs to cut curves and bends
The next step is the drilling in order to be able to assemble the pieces together by using a CNC machine again
When it is done  wood putty will be spread on the holes or uneven surfaces of the wood pieces
It is because wood is natural and so can have some imperfections
Then  sandpaper will be used to smooth the wood pieces
It can be conducted manually or by machines depending on the aera requiring to be smooth out and the shape of it
Then  As the sides of wood is raw and plain  a desired pattern will be printed by a compressing machine on it to beautify the wood pieces
The next step is the lamination process where the veneer will be glued onto the core panels of the furniture
A veneer is a slice of real wood and is distinctive depending on the grain  cut  and species of the tree
After that  there is another sanding process followed by a colouring process in order to assure the quality of the pieces
The more there are coats of paint  the better the quality will be
The wet pain will be dry by a boiler
The next step is the packaging where all the wood pieces will be putted together in the right package accordingly to the order and it will be sent to the customer  finishing the process
