UCB is a global biopharmaceutical company focused on creating value for people living with severe diseases in immunology and neurology now and into the future
The company hires 2 students to do a stocktake of the medicines
Boxes are displayed on shelves and each box contains one kind of medicines
The medicines are stocked in 8 different rooms of different temperatures  each room having two aisles
The process starts with each student counting the medicine from one alley
After counting the number of medicines from one box  each student has to write down on a paper the number they have counted
Once the aisle is done  a double check is done  the students switch places and count the medicines from the other aisle
Each student takes the paper from the other one and write down what he has written
If the two students count the same quantities  they can go to following rooms
If the students don t have the same quantities  both have to count again until they count the same number of medicines
In each room  some medicines  with an inscription on it  can be discarded
The student must then throw them away in a bin

When each room is in order  the students have to highlight the products on the paper  highlight in green if the number of medicines calculated by the students is the same as what was previously encoded in the software or highlight in rose if it is not the same
Once they finish  the students have to give their paper to the employee who is responsible for them
The employee encodes the new results on a software

At this level the customer has to decide to send it by itself or to send it to the drop off point  Relay Mondial

Once the shipment is made  SHEIN receives  checks the quality and issues a refund
But insofar as the customer decides to make a deposit at the Relay Mondial point  the customer will print the return label that he will stick on the package
Then drop the package at a point  Relay Mondial  closest to his home
Once the deposit is made SHEIN receives  checks the quality and issues the refund
This process begins when a department runs out of material
The head of the department fills out a voucher for expressing the need that he gives to the storekeeper
The shopkeeper receives the voucher  checks whether the product requested is in stock
If so  he enters the voucher  has the voucher signed by the applicant and performs a delivery
Since the item is not in stock  it retains the voucher and initiates an order with the supplier
Once the item has been received from the supplier  the storekeeper enters the voucher  has it signed by the applicant and makes the delivery
BaByliss is the company where I worked as a student  I worked on the suppliers  invoices
The process starts when an employee receives an invoice from a customer
For example an invoice from Carrefour
The employee prints the invoice twice
Both copies must be brought to the accounting department
The first copy must be filed in the first classification which is done in alphabetical order
The second copy must be posted by an employee of the accounting department
To post an invoice consists for example in assigning to the invoice the number of the supplier  the number of the general leger account  the number of the department which made the expense
Then the CEO has to check if the invoice is posted in a correct way
Afterwards  there are two options  either the CFO validates the invoice  or the CEO doesn t validate the invoice  then the employee has to remake it until the CFO valid it
When the CFO has validated the allocation  an employee of the accounting department can book the invoice on SAP
At the end of the booking  the employee must write on the invoice the number generated by SAP
The employee fills the second copy in the second classification which is done by booking number  number generated by SAP   the process is finished
As scout leaders  we must organize a day trip every year
The process starts with the first meeting between leaders  the staff  to organize the day trip during which the leaders share their ideas together
Then the staff musts select one destination
The destination can be for example Oostende  Brucellas  Maastricht
The staff makes the invitation
When the invitation is made  the staff sends it via emails to the parents and via Instagram to the scouts
Then the scouts of their parents must confirm their participation or not to the staff
If the Scout does not participate in the day trip  the process ends here
If the Scout participates at the day trip  she must pay by transfer to the scouts  bank account
When the staff has received all the payments  they can request for the reduction of scouts on the SNCB website
The staff receives the confirmation of its request from the SNCB
After receiving the confirmation of their request the staff can pick up the tickets at the train station and the process is over because everything is ready for the D day
A small company produces and sells artisanal ice cream
In summer  customers can order ice cream to take away directly from the counter  or enjoy an ice cream on the terrace
The person at the counter takes the orders  collects the money and makes the ice cream to go
For example  an ice cream cone with 2 scoops of lemon melon with whipped cream
The waitress takes orders from the terrace  cashes in and makes the ice cream cups
For example  a mikado pancake and a fanta
When there is a shortage of a particular flavour  the manageress must be contacted  who is responsible for restocking the fridges

The manageress also takes care of everything that revolves around the creation of ice cream  namely  fetching the necessary ingredients  e g   milk from the neighbouring farm  fruit from the local yard   preparing the ice cream
A customer may also come to the counter to order litres of ice cream or ice cream cakes
In this case  the manageress is called in and takes care of recording the orders
The person at the counter collects the orders
People who come to the counter can also pick up their order  in which case the manager is called and takes care of packing the order and passing it on to the customer
At the end of the day  the counter person and the waitress count all the orders made  clean the space and put the tips in the common pot
Takeway is an online food ordering company
The process starts when a customer validates and pays his order with a restaurant proposed by the platform
In the platform  customers can choose between different plates and different restaurants
Then takeaway customer service receives a message notifying the order
And Takeaway sends a confirmation request to the restaurant
After thatThe restaurant confirms or denies the order
Takeaway receive a notification
Meanwhile  the restaurant prepares the order
If the order is rejected  Takeaway apologizes by email and refunds the customer and the process is finished
If the order is accepted  Takeaway confirms the order by email
At the same time  Takeaway sends a delivery man to pick up the order
At the same time  the restaurant prepares the order
Then  the customer receives the delivery delays
The restaurant sends a notification to Takeaway when the order is ready to be delivered
The restaurant tries to respect delays to get real customer satisfaction
Takeaway signals to the customer that the delivery man is on his way
The customer receives his order  the process is finished
Uber eats is an american online food ordering and delivery platform
The process starts when a restaurant tells Uber eats that they need a driver
Uber eats sends the notification to the driver closest to the restaurant
The driver receives the notification with the name and address of the restaurant
The driver accepts or refuses the ride
if refusal  Uber eats sends the request to another driver
Uber eats sends the restaurant GPS data to the driver
The GPS data are connected with uber eats system and also show the delivery process to the customer
The driver goes to the restaurant
The driver picks up the order
The driver notifies it to Uber eat
Uber eats sends to the driver the address of the delivery location and the GPS data
The driver goes to the customer s house to deliver
Uber eats sends the amount of the race to the driver at the end of the delivery  the process is finished
Big airline is a company  which daily manage complaints and feedbacks of hundreds of people
Process starts when SMM manager receives a comment under a post
A comment can be either positive or negative
In cause of a positive comment  manager writes an answer and sends it under the post
If a comment is negative and includes disrespectful words  manager deletes this comment and blocks the sender
Otherwise  manager takes the claim in work
First  manager asks the customer to specify all the details of the situation and the booking code in a private message
Once customer contacts manager in private message  manager has one hour to take the first contact and answers
While considering a claim  manager uses empathy and a personal approach
Manager solves the problem of the client  involving the relevant departments to support
Once the claim is resolved and the client is informed about the results  manager creates a report with all the necessary information
Finally  manager sends a final report of the day to the top manager
Process starts with the identification of a potential client
The sales manager fills in a form with the necessary information such as country  budget  timeline  product offered
Then the sales manager organizes a review with the chief marketing officer to validate the interest for this prospect
If the interest is not confirmed the sales manager politely declines the client
Otherwise  the sale manager passes the case to the proposal team
The proposal team is responsible to prepare commercial and technical offer for the client
Once the offer is prepared and validated  the sales manager transmits the offer to the client and organizes a virtual meeting to present the offer and answers any question
If the offer is accepted by the client  the proposal team with support of the legal team drafts a contract
The proposal and sales managers review the contract with the client before signature
The CEO travels to sign the contract with the client
The flight is in the business class
In July  there is a scout camp
The preparation starts early
First of all scoutmasters have to choose a place for this camp
They must reserve it
If there is no other reservation for this place  they have to put down a deposit to the owner
If there is already a reservation  they have to search for another location
Once they found the camp site  they have to think about games and material
If the material is damaged  they have to buy new one
Meanwhile they have to tell the parents of the scouts about the camp
The scoutmasters send a document to collect information
These information can be the name  first name  address for instance
If the parents agree to let their child go the camp  they have to send back a message and the inscription to the camp is done
If the parents don t agree  they still have to send a message and there is no inscription
If there is a valid inscription  the parents receive the information concerning the location and the date
The first step to ship a present abroad is to go to the delivery agency
You will have to tell the place where the package must be sent
They need information such as the country  the town  the street   Then the present is weighed
Different packaging will be used depending on the weight of the package
If the weight is under 1kg  an envelope will be used
But if it s above 1kg  they will use a cardboard box
Once the packaging is defined  the poste agency will apply a stamp on the package
You will have to pay for this service
They keep the package in the agency to ship it
Every Wednesday packages are collected for delivery
The day of delivery  you will receive a message with the information of the shipment
After this message you will have to wait up to 5 days  depending on where you want to send the package
Once the package is received  you will receive a message confirming the receipt
If you don t receive a message after 5 days  you have to contact the agency
Either there was an error and they restart the delivery process
In this case you earn a small compensation
Or the package is lost and they compensate the entire product  because this is their fault

Amazon has a large storage capacity in these warehouses

A couple of people want to launch itself in a construction project

When a person posts an envelope in the mailbox of his village  it is taken care of daily by the village letter carrier
The letter carrier then picks up the envelope and brings it back to the depot at the end of the day
At the depot  the letter is taken to the sorting center specialized for letters
The next morning  the letter is sorted according to its destination
Then a van takes charge of the letter and those that correspond to the same geographical area to bring them to the appropriate post center
Once arrived at the good deposit they are again sorted by smaller geographical zone
The next day very early in the morning  around 4 00   at 7 30 the letters are distributed according to the rounds of the factors
The postmen sort the letters in the order of their rounds and then go to the inhabitants to deposit them
Making the delivery of packages
When a parcel arrives at the Bpost depot  the first thing to do is to sort it according to the letter carrier s round
Then the mailman takes care of the parcel
The postman puts the parcel in his van according to the order of his round
Then he goes on his rounds to deliver it to the customer

If the customer is not there  the parcel is either returned to the depot and the delivery is made again the next day  or the parcel is dropped off at a neighbor s house or in a safe place  or the parcel is dropped of at a relay point
In the last 2 cases  it is up to the customer to pick up the parcel once it is marked as delivered
Philippart is a traditional bakery where you can buy bread  pastries and chocolate

If the bakery employee is not in the shop  he or she is alerted that a customer has entered by the bell
The employee asks for the order

The employee prepares the customer s order in the shop   slices the bread  packs the pastries and so on
The shop contains all the available items and there is also a storage room at the back for items in case of a large order
The customer pays cash or pays by card
The customer takes the order and the recipeit
The customer leaves the bakery  the process is finished
Fiedelers M M is a drink market which delivers drinks with and without alcohol
The process starts when a customer telephones the office to place an order
For example  10 kegs of beer  15 crates of coke and 8 crates of water
The employee notes the order and communicates the price to the customer
The customers confirms or not his order
The employee goes to the warehouse to prepare the customer s order
The warehouse contains all the available items and if necessary  a new order is placed with the supplier
Another employee ensures that the order is complete
The employees load the truck
The employee drives the truck to the delivery site  unloads the goods and hands the invoice to the customer

The employee comes back to the office
Within one month the customer makes the bank transfer  the process is finished
First the person puts his articles on the conveyor belt
Then the conveyor belt brings the items close to the cashier
The cashier says hello and starts scanning the items
Items can sometimes be heavy and require a physical effort from the storekeeper
The store clerk asks the customer while scanning the items if he has the loyalty card
If the customer has the loyalty card  the store clerk asks him to put it in the reader and presses the  Club Malin  button on his cash register
If not  the storekeeper suggests that the customer goes to a terminal to make his loyalty card and quickly explains how it works
When an article does not have a price or a barcode  he calls on the microphone so that one of his colleagues can see it in the aisle and then notes the information by hand on his machine
Then when the scan of all the articles is finished he presses TOTAL on his cash register and announces the price displayed to the customer
Then the storekeeper looks to see if the person is paying by card or cash
If the person pays by card  he presses on the bank card displayed on his cash register and then on OK
The person just has to put his card in the reader and write his code
A ticket is issued and the clerk hands it to the customer and says goodbye
If the customer pays by cash  he notes the amount given by the customer and presses the cash button on the machine
The cash register opens and the ticket starts to come out
Then he gives the change and the receipt to the customer and says goodbye
The vaccination center is located at the Ciney Expo
First of all  the receptionist greets the patient
Then he asks him for his identity card and his invitation to the vaccination and checks that the two names match
If they match  the patient can continue the steps
If they do not match  the patient is refused
If the patient does not have his ID card the patient must come back later
If the patient does not have his convocation but has some proof of his appointment he can continue the path and if not he must go to the information office
If the person has to go to the information desk  the receptionist will show him the way to go there
The receptionist then checks the time of the appointment  if it is in more than 15 minutes he asks the patient to wait
If the appointment is within 15 minutes or less  the receptionist asks the patient to follow him her and to position him herself in front of the camera that takes the temperature
If the camera does not work directly  the receptionist takes the infrared thermometer and points it on the patient s forehead
If the patient s temperature is less than 38° then the patient can continue the steps and if not the patient must go home and contact his doctor
If the patient is accompanied then the caregiver must ask if the person is autonomous or not
If the person is not autonomous  the attendant is allowed to go with the patient
If not  the accompanying person is not allowed to go with the patient
Then the receptionist indicates the way to the check in
He also indicates that there are documents on shelves along the way and that the patient must fill them out
If the patient does not know how to fill in the document on the shelves by himself  the receptionist offers his help
The process starts when a client comes in a garage and the car dealer received a new car request from him
He assesses the needs and requirements of the client  budget  new or used vehicle  type of vehicle  number of seats on board  engine power  type of fuel  etc
Car dealer searches cars based on client s car preferences
Seller can provide two possible responses
If he doesn t have a vehicle that meets the customer s needs  he tells the client  and the request stops there
If he has a vehicle that meets the customer s needs  he proposes 3 types of car
For example   a used car  a new car in his stock or a new car that still needs to be built
Client can rejects all the proposed car or accepts one of the proposed cars  or changes car preferences
In case of a vehicle is chosen  car dealer requests client s personal information and asks if there is a car to take back the old vehicle or not and makes an offer for the new and the old car
After one weeks  if the answer is not received  a reminder is sent  and client has another one week to answer
If no answer is received  the request is cancelled  and dealer notifies client

If the customer is decided  the dealer asks to pay a deposit to reserve the vehicle while waiting for the administrative formalities to be in order  technical control  insurance  license plate  and possibly the car s manufacturing
When everything is in order  a few weeks for a vehicle in stock or used or several months if it is a new car   the seller contacts the customer to make the delivery
The delivery day  the customer pays the rest of the bill and the garage ends up delivering the car to the customer
The process starts when the construction company received a new house request from a client
Construction company searches and evaluates possibilities based on client s house preferences  budget  appartement or house  location  number of bedrooms  garden garage or not  etc
Seller provides two possible responses  an apartment or a house that meets the client s criteria and waits for the answer
After 1month  if the answer is not received  a reminder is sent and client has 2 weeks to answer
If no answer is received  the request is cancelled and construction company notifies client
Client can provide four possible responses
If the customer is decided  the construction company asks to the architect to make plans which will be submitted to the client
After 2 weeks  if the answer is not received  a reminder is sent and client has 2 weeks to answer
If no answer is received  the request is cancelled and construction company notifies client
After having built the house  the construction company has the house controlled by an approved organism such as Vincotte
Finally  the customer pays the rest of the invoice
The company proceeds to the transfer of ownership  via a notarial deed  and the handing over of the keys to the customer

The process starts when the Merchandise arrives to the inventory
The inventory employee are notified that the merchandise is waiting in the first area of the inventory
Group of Employees pre sort the merchandise to keep only the conform one
Meanwhile define the return items and automatically registere them in the return form which will be sent back with the defective Merchandises to the logistic department
Then the Merchandises are relocated to the next part to be treated according to the quality standards in 5 steps  washing  spinning  first pre drying  waxing  second pre drying
The employee sort the conforming goods again and record its final quantity and weight  as well as the defective quantity to be rejected
Then notify the packaging department to send the packaging adequate via an automatically generated notification on the system with the required quantity
Then once the packaging arrives the responsible of inventory check and Confirm the validation of quantity actually received on the system inventory sheet
Finally the employee establish an order form of the quantity of products to be exported by category  type  supplier  as well as the quantity produced rejected

The process begins when the animal is born

The process begins when a patient makes an appointment via the laboratory s website
The stock of blood collection kits is then reduced by one unit
If the total number of kits available is greater than or equal to twenty units  the process is complete
However  if the total number of available kits falls below the threshold of 20 units  a notification is sent to the laboratory s sales department
A sales employee is then responsible for ordering 100 new kits from the supplier
When the order is received by the supplier  he sends the order directly
The invoice is sent in parallel with the order by the supplier
Payment terms are determined by the supplier
As soon as the order is received  the employee stores the kits in the laboratory
The sales employee then pays the invoice via bank transfer
Finally  the stock is updated and the process is completed
The process begins when a request for a language stay is made by a client
Generally  it is young people in search of adventure who contact the agency
The client communicates the destination  the period of time and the language of interest
The agency s employee receives this information
The employee then analyzes the possibilities and makes a proposal to the client for homestay and school
The client is notified of this proposal
If the client refuses the proposal  the employee must make a new proposal
If the client accepts the proposal  the employee sends a form with personal information to be filled in
The client is notified of this request  fills out the form and returns it to the agency employee
The employee receives the completed form
The employee sends the payment information to the customer who is notified that they need to pay
If the payment is received by the agency within 10 days  the reservation is confirmed and the process is completed
If the payment is not received within 10 days  the reservation is cancelled and the client is notified
In my student job  I work at CooperVision  a company that sells and distributes lenses worldwide
First  an order is placed by the customer  optician or private individual
This order is received at CooperVision
The order received is automatically generated in a program
This program assigns a box with a unique barcode to this order
Depending on the size of the order  a box can be divided into up to eight compartments  named A to H  each with a barcode
The box is then sent on a conveyor that runs through the entire company
Lasers  placed at the beginning of each zone  scan the barcode on the box to see if any of the products in the order belong in that zone
If no product from the zone is in the order  the box continues and the process continues
If one or more products from the order are in the zone  the box goes out on a ramp so that an employee can pick up the corresponding products
When the employee retrieves the box  he she must first scan it to identify the box and check if it is properly segmented
If it is well segmented  he has to validate this segmentation on his computer  if it is not  he has to change the segmentation of the box and then validate on the computer
After that  the computer sends the employee to the location of the product
The employee must then scan the location of the product  which serves as a check
The computer then tells the employee how many products to take  what they are and where to put them in the box
The employee must validate the selection of the product s
The action can be repeated as many times as there are products in the area
Once there are no more products belonging to the order in the area  the computer sends the message  Done
The box must then be placed back on the conveyor line
Once all the items in the order have been picked  the order continues on the conveyor to the packing area
Degrease your bodywork well with a degreaser
Clean with a dry cloth
Remove the remains of old paint using 600 grit sandpaper
Then sand with 1000 and 2000 grit sandpaper until you have a smooth surface
Apply the primer
Sand the primer with 2000 grit sandpaper
IMPORTANT  Shake the can well for 2 minutes
Apply a first thin layer of base paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sanding paper 20000
Apply a second coat of base paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sandpaper 20000
Apply a first thin coat of coloured paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
Sand with sandpaper 20000
Apply a 2nd thin coat of coloured paint
Allow to dry for at least 10 minutes
The application of a varnish is not compulsory but strongly recommended
The process starts when a customer buys a flight ticket on the internet
On the scheduled day  the customer goes to the airport
The customers parks his car
Then the customer walks to the check in desk
The employee asks for the customer s ticket and passport
If the papers are in order  the employee checks the luggage in
If not  the process is finished
For example  an outdated passport
The customers goes through the security check
An airport has all the equipment needed to ensure safety
Then the customers walks to the right boarding gate
An airport employee asks for the customer s papers again
Finally  the customer gets on the plane and the process is finished

Otherwise  the process is finished
The morning of the job  the agency sends an electronic contract to the worker
The worker signs electronically the contract
The worker goes to the place of the job
The worker executes the job and comes back home
Following Thursday money is sent by the agency to the worker  the process is finished

My journey starts when my alarm rings
If I have to go to school  I wake up at 6 00 am but if I don t need to go to school in the morning because I have home school  I usually wake up at 8 0
When I am awake  I take a shower and every 4 days I wash my hair
After I had my shower  I choose my clothes and put make up on
Usually  when I am nearly ready my mother calls me to have breakfast with her but it depends on whether I am hungry or not

After having breakfast  I will wash my teeth

After school  I come back home  eat with my mum and relax in the sofa
At 9 00  I go to bed and watch a movie until I finally fell asleep usually at 10 00 or 10 30 and the process starts again every day
The process starts when the client decides to buy something on the Amazon website
The client goes to the website and starts to look at the thing he would like to buy
He finds the object but there are several suppliers
He needs to choose between 2 suppliers
If he chooses the first supplier he will pay 19 95€ and will be delivered in 10 days
On the other hand  the second supplier sells the product at 39 95€ but the customer will receive its order in 2 to 3 days
The customer decides to select the second one because he needs its product really quick
The customer orders the product and pay
The supplier receives the order and confirm it
Amazon send a notification to the customer saying the supplier has accepted the order
The supplier prepares the order and the following day  he brings the order to the post office
Then  Amazon send a notification to the customer saying that the order is in transit and will arrive in 1 to 2 days

The following day the customer receives its order at home and has 2 choices  if the customer likes the product he can keep it and give a good feedback to the supplier or if he is not happy with the product he can send it back to Amazon and the process finishes
In this case  the customer is happy with its order so he keeps it and the process stops

The patient clicks on  Ok

In the meantime  the osteopath receives a notification to let her know of the appointment  the process is finished
NMC is one of the world s leading companies in protective packaging and technical insulation
The process starts when the raw materials arrive at the production line
Once the materials are unpacked and ready  a worker has to put them into the machine
The moment the machine starts to produce the product  a worker pack the final products at the end of the production line and to pay attention in case something goes wrong
Should it happen that a product is stuck somewhere or the machine needs new raw materials the worker must stop the machine and inform his superior in order to prevent any further problems
Furthermore  because NMC works with highly flammable materials the worker should be careful that there are no static charges anywhere to prevent fire
Once all products are packed they can be loaded into trucks to be finally delivered to the customers
Because customer satisfaction is very important to NMC  delivery must happen as quickly and smoothly as possible
Jovanni is my favourite ice cream vendor here in the area
He is already 67 years old  but he doesn t look any older than 50
When you go buy ice cream at Jovanni  every customer is greeted warmly  because customer satisfaction is key
As soon as it is your turn to order  you are asked how many scoops you would like and whether you would prefer a paper cup or a waffel
After that  you choose the tastes you want to eat and  optionally  different glazes   which are always quite tasty
Before choosing the taste you want  customers can always try it out first – which is very practical because you do not choose something you do not like
After the ice cream has been handed over to the customer  payment must of course be made
the price depends on the circumstances  If customers eat at Giovanni s place the VTA is higher  which means the ice is also more expensive
In return  if the customers take the ice cream home or do not eat at Jovanni s place then the VTA is not as high and the ice is cheaper
To conclude  Jovanni is a very kind and courteous person that always cares for its customers and for the children  that is also why every child gets a free ice cream scoop with every visit
I am very happy to have Jovanny in my hometown
The following describes the order to cash process of the Belgian retailer ASB
The order to cash process starts when the client makes an inquiry and asks for a price
This can be done by email  by phone or even in presence
Then  the salesperson makes an offer and sends it to the client
The client can accept the offer  reject it  or ask for another price
In the latter case  either a new offer will be made and sent to the client or the salesperson will stick to the offer
If the offer is accepted  the client makes an order
The salesperson then creates an order confirmation and sends it to the client
The client checks it
If there are mistakes  he will let the salesperson know who will then correct it and send a new one
If the order confirmation is correct  the client validates it
After  the salesperson checks if the goods are in stock or not
If the goods are not in stock  they need to be ordered at the supplier
If the goods are in stock  the salesperson creates a delivery note and sends it to the storekeeper
The storekeeper will prepare the goods
Either  the goods will be delivered or the client will pick them up
If the goods will be delivered to the client  the delivery note goes to the transportation department
They will deliver the goods
If the delivery went well  the accounting department creates the invoice and sends it to the client
The client will then pay his purchase
If the delivery went wrong  the firm needs to check its stock again and make a new delivery
If the goods are picked up by the client  an accountant will directly create the invoice and send it to the client
The client will then pay his purchase
The following describes the procurement to pay process of the Belgian retailer ASB
The process starts when we notixce that a good that is needed is not in stock
The purchase department will then first  create a delivery note for the client that asked for the goods
If the goods that need to be purchased are  regular  goods  the purchaser will make an order directly
If the goods that need to purchased are  specific  goods  the purchaser will ask for a price at the supplier
If the price is good  the purchaser will accept it
If the price isn t good  the purchaser will negotiate until the price is acceptable
After accepting the price  the purchaser orders the goods
They will use the number of the delivery note through the whole procurement process at the supplier
After ordering  the purchaser will get an order confirmation from the supplier and check it
If there are mistakes  he will let the supplier know and ask for a new  correct order confirmation
If the order confirmation is correct  the purchaser will approve it
Then  the goods will be delivered to the warehouse
In the warehouse  the quantity and the quality of the goods will be checked
If there is something incorrect  the purchaser will either ask for a new delivery or ask to get the missing goods at an additional delivery
If the goods are ok  the firm will get an invoice from the supplier
A clerk will check the invoice
If the invoice is correct  it will be sent to an accountant who will pay the supplier
If the invoice isn t correct  the clerk will block it in the system
Then  he will require a credit note at the supplier
After having received the credit note  the clerk will unblock the invoice in the system and an accountant will pay the difference between the amount on the invoice and on the credit note
The process start when the client signs in his personal account
then AIRBNB asks the journey information from the client
Such as the place  the period to stay  maximum price to pay
Then AIRBNB analyze the client demand [places available in period demanded ] and give him the most interesting offers
Then the client have the option to choose one of the options  don t choose any of them or do more filter like [amenities in the place to stay  HOST language or to be a special HOST ]
if the client do more filter option the process is performed and analyzed again to give best offers and so on
if the client don t choose a place the process end
In case the client chooses a place  AIRBNB request from the client an identity document  recent personal picture  and enter a payment card
if the client don t provide information the process is canceled
if the client provide all information  AIRBNB take 24h to verify the identity and everything

then the AIRBNB give the decision  either to reject the booking so the process is canceled and the client is informed  or the booking is confirmed and the AIRBNB send to customer the booking information and finalize the process
The process start when the client log in to the company website
then the client fills in the travel information [departure  arrival and dates ]

then the company analyze the information and consult the client past flights to see what he she prefer then give the client the most interesting flights [prices  class ] with recommended flight based on past flights if exist

then the client can refuse all flights offered and the process is finished  or change flights properties like changing the arrival airport or departure or also dates   in this case the company re analyze the demand and give offers according to it  or also the client could accept a flight

then the company propose some extra services to the client that have superior costs that could accept or refuse  so after this the company ask the client to pay  there is three method of payment first
if the client have a lot of bonus point in the account and could afford the flight cost with it  or to pay the hole by the credit card
if he she is a new client or a client that has no bonus point  he choses the third option which is hybrid

if the client has bonus point but not enough to cover all flight cost so he she will pay the rest with card  the client has a limited time [there is no exact time but an estimation of 30 min] to pay or the website will be actualized and he she will repeat from the start
if the client pay within the time  the flight is confirmed and company send flight information and E ticket to the client by mail
A company that needs to hire staff has an internal recruitment procedure
The hiring process starts when the company identifies an internal hiring need
Then  the hiring staff devises a recruitment plan
The hiring staff generates a job description that includes a list of job requirements  desired characteristics and requisite experience
The hiring staff advertises and recruits the position
For example  the position is published by using a company s website  social media platforms such as LinkedIn and newspaper advertisements
Then  the hiring staff reviews the applications and identifies those that require interview
The interview are scheduled for the candidates with the people in the company involved
Some companies check the background of the candidates to be sure that the potential employees could represent the company in a professional manner
The reference of the candidates are checked also
After the background checking and reference checking  the hiring staff takes decision
Then  the hiring staff sends a job offer
After all  the candidate who accepts the job offer is hired
After the hiring process  the company has an onboarding process
The hiring staff prepares colleagues to welcome the new employee
Then  the staff prepares the new employee s office and the tools that employee needs
For example  the new employee needs computer  access to programs  email and phone numbers
The first day  the new employee is presented to the team
Then  the RH staff schedules meetings for to present the projects to the new employee
The RH staff assigns a mentor for the new employee
Then  the mentor explains to the new employee the performance goals
The first month  the RH staff registers the new employee in training
The RH staff makes also an evaluation after 30  60 and 90 days
The RH staff organizes an after work gathering to meet the new employee informally
After 6 months  the HR staff evaluates the work of the new employee
Hotel Le Plaza is a luxury hotel with reception area open 24h a day
The check in process starts when customers present themselves at the reception
The receptionist requests their identification document and confirmation of reservation
Customers are asked to fill in the individual police form

The receptionist retrieves the completed police form and verifies the information to make sure all are correctly recorded in the management software or else he she has to encode the missing information
The receptionist requests a deposit used to cover customers  expenses that might occur during the stay
The deposit can be given by credit card or in cash
If the reservation is prepaid  a deposit of 50€ per night is required
If the reservation is not prepaid  the receptionist requests a deposit amounting to the total of the price of the stay plus 50€ per night
Then  the receptionist checks the status of the attributed room in the management software
The hotel offers several types of room such as classic  deluxe and suite
If the assigned room is ready  the receptionist gives the room key to customer and explains them about the hotel s facilities  the process is finished
If the assigned room is not ready after the check in time  the receptionist allocates another room  gives the key to customers and explains them about the hotel s facilities  the process is finished

If the assigned room is not ready before the check in time  the receptionist informs the customer and ask the housekeeping department to put the customer s room in priority to get it ready as soon as possible
The housekeeping department notifies the reception when the room asked previously is ready
The receptionist gives the room key to customer and explains them about the hotel s facilities  the process is finished
The process starts when the customer validates the form on the dedicated area of the main page of SNCB to plan his her travel

SNCB displays all details related to the chosen itinerary

The prices vary depending on the situation of each traveler
The customer validates his her choice and fills in the required information to finalize the purchase
This time  SNCB needs information such as traveler s full name  choice of payment methods and ticket delivery
SNCB directs the customer to the payment page
The customer follows the payment instruction and validates the payment
After being notified that the payment is accepted  SNCB sends the e ticket to the customer
The e ticket can be downloaded directly from SNCB website where the customer is redirected from the payment page 15
The customer receives the e ticket according to the choice of ticket delivery  the process is finished
Epicerie Wangen is a grocery store located in Cherain that sells almost everything

The Pomodorino is a company  which makes homemade tomato sauce by using tomatoes from Italy and a machine that presses the tomato
The workers start by cutting the tomatoes in half to make cooking easier the next day
The company leaves the chopped tomatoes in the saucepans overnight
Once the night has passed  the company passes the tomatoes through a machine that costs around € 500 and which is made of iron  which presses the tomato
The company installs bed sheets to filter the water and preserve the tomato juice
Like when you use a sieve to filter the solid
The juice is collected and cooked for 5 hours  adding salt regularly   La Baleine  brand salt
The sauce is then bottled
The company checks that the caps close properly to promote sterilization
The company places the bottles under cover to maintain the sterilization phase
The company puts the bottles in the cold warehouse
The diploma department is part of the University
The process starts when a graduated student call to make a appointment for receiving his diploma
The employee asks for the disponibilities of the student
The student communicates his agenda
For example  Tuesday and Wednesday afternoon
The employee makes a appointment regarding the disponibility
On the due date  the student arrives
The employee asks the student to present his ID card
The student gives his ID card
The employee gives the diploma to the student and gives some information
The diploma contains the languages of learning  the title of the thesis and the grades
The student reads and checks if all the information are correct
If there is a mistake  the diploma is sent back to the faculty and the process has to restart
If there is no mistake  the student signs his diploma to validate it
Meanwhile  the employee writes the ID information on the acknowledgement of receipt
The student signs the acknowledgement of receipt to confirm that he has received the diploma
The student leaves with his diploma
The employee desinfects the place for the next student  the process is finished
The process starts when a new year starts
The scanning of the acknowledgement receipts has the objective to keep documents available for many years
The student takes the acknowledgement receipts with names beginning with one specific letter and from the previous year
The student sorts the acknowledgement receipt by alphabetical order
For example  first Anom Dupont and then Azul Benjamin
In addition  the student unties the potential sheets of paper attached to them with a staple
The student scans the acknowledgment receipts
The student transfers the PDF file into the appropriate folder
The student opens the PDF file
The student renames individually each acknowledgement receipt by the name of the person who signed it
When all the acknowledgement receipts are renamed  the student deletes the original PDF file
The objective is to avoid having twice the same document
The student ties the potential paper that he untied
The student puts the acknowledgement receipts in a box for archiving
The student restarts the process with the next letter
If he started with names beginning with the letter A  now he has to do the names beginning with the letter B
When all the letters are done  the process is finished
The Big 4 often have a high staff turnover  so a  sorting  system is necessary to ensure that not just anyone is working for the company
The process starts when the company receives an application
The candidate s CV is reviewed by the human resources department

After analysing the CV  HR sends an e mail to the candidate either to schedule an interview  if it matches the criteria sought by the company  or to inform the candidate that he or she is not suitable
The head of the HR department passes the interview on to the candidate
Within 3 days after the interview  the company informs the candidate that he or she will have to take skills tests
If not  the candidate is informed that he or she is not selected
The HR department schedules a date with the candidate for the skills test
For example  a test consisting of 20 questions in the form of multiple choice questions
The company passes the test to the candidate
If the candidate passes the test  the company makes an offer within 7 days  otherwise it informs the candidate that he or she is not selected
The offer is sent either by e mail or by fax  depending on the company s choice
Once the candidate has accepted the offer  the company schedules an appointment with the candidate to have him her sign the employment contract
The process ends when the candidate signs the contract
Nowadays  it is not always easy to make yourself something to eat every day when you come home from work  it is sometimes too late and you don t feel like cooking
That s why Takeaway  a Dutch company  offers its services to Internet users
The process starts when you start to get hungry  no matter what time of day or where you are
Once you feel hungry  you go to the Takeaway website
Once on the site  you can browse through the various offers on offer
If the offers on the site do not appeal to us or do not correspond to our expectations  we log out and decide to cook a good meal anyway
Otherwise  if a restaurant or brasserie appeals to us  the process continues and we click on the desired restaurant
It is important to know that Takeaway offers something for every taste  Chinese food  Italian food

An additional window will then appear with a summary of the order
The customer must then check the different elements of his order  to make sure there are no surprises on reception
If everything is correct  you can click on the  pay  button
However  there is one thing to pay attention to  namely the delivery costs
In fact  Takeaway does not work for free  additional costs are then charged to the person ordering  usually 5€
When the payment is settled  both Takeaway and the restaurateur receive the order notification
At this moment  the customer only has to wait for the delivery man to ring the doorbell
The process ends when the customer receives their food at the delivery point they specified when placing their order
All the customer has to do is enjoy their delicious meal

In August 2019  my big sister got married
I was in charge of throwing her bachelorette party
First thing to do was asking for help from the bridesmaids  my cousin and my sister s best friends
We talked and concluded that we preferred to make it a surprise for the bride to be
Then  we set a budget
Next step was pre planning everything according to my sister s personality and preferences  the location  theme  food  timeframe  activities and guest list
The theme was Bachelorette Slumber Party
We set all of the deadlines
Then  it was time to spread the word
We chose to invite people over social media
The bachelorette party was a mix of old friends  new friends and family members
We made reservations and bookings
Next  we took care of details  goodies and decorations
Making sure that a lot of surprises that my sister would love was a must
Surprises we prepared were gifts  collecting embarrassing childhood pictures  ordering her favourite food
At this point we got back in touch with the group and finalized the program
Zara is part of Inditex  the world s largest fashion retailers
I applied on the Inditex Careers website
Once you are registered on Inditex Careers  you will be able to register your personal data and submit your resume and your cover letter
About a week later  you get a response and an invitation to a group interview
At the interview  you receive forms to fill out and you will be asked in which store and department you would like to work at
Inditex is composed of eight brands so  you will have to choose whether you want to work for Zara  Bershka  Pull   Bear
Then  you will be split into groups of 5 persons and you will watch videos about the company
After watching clips  questions will be asked
Participation is not mandatory but highly encouraged
Again  you will be split into groups of 3 people
That is when serious things begin  the real group interview
3 days later  I was called to tell me that I would work in such Zara and such department
You also get an invitation to sign your contract
The process starts when the customer enters the website of Pull Bear
The website shows 2 different categories to choose from  Man or Women
After the customer makes his choice  the website direct them to other categories  Clothing  shoes  bags
The customer explores among all the products and select the ones he likes
Then  he chose the right size and adds the item to the shopping cart
The client has two different options
He can return to the main page and repeat the process again
Or he can directly go to process the order
For the latter  the customer needs to sign in or he can continue as a guest
After that  the customer choose how he prefers its products to be delivered  Store delivery  collection point or home delivery
For the two first options  Pull Bear requests the customer s address and provide him with a list of stores and drop off points close to his location to choose from
Then  it requests the customer s personal details
However  if the client chose home delivery  Pull Bear will directly ask about his personal details  email  name  phone number  and the delivery details  his home address
Then the customer has two possibilities  Standard delivery or Express delivery  Plus money fees
After the order is made  the client proceeds to the payment online
When the payment is received  Pull Bear notifies the client by sending a confirmation mail
After the product is transferred to DPD Belgium  a delivery service   Pull Bear sends an electronic ticket to notify the customer
On the day the delivery  DPD Belgium sends a message to inform the customer about the delivery time
And the customer receives the parcel
That is the end of the process
The process starts when the customer enters the app Bla Bla Car in his phone

After that  the customer completes his Journey route  Departure and destination  number of passengers  the date
The app shows a list of carpooling offers by cars and by bus sorted by time
The customer books the best offer after checking the offers  details  The meeting place  the time  the price  the driver  and the driver s car

He can provide two answers

And the process ends here

The retailer receives the list of groceries
The next day  an employee is given the list and starts collecting the groceries in the physical shop
When the cart contains all the groceries contained in the list  the employee encodes on the shop software
After that  the customer is notified about the fulfilment of his order

Acounti is a small accounting firm  which handles the accounts of his clients and provides advices to them
The process starts when the accountant enters and his office and checks his management software
The documents needed to encode the accounting records are sent there by every client
He downloads the documents of a specific client from this software
After having downloaded all the required documents  the accountant starts the accounting software and encodes each transaction
When he has done all the sales  purchases  and financial records for this client  he ticks on the management software that the encoding for this client is completed
If there are still documents to download for other clients or if new documents have been received  he downloads these and starts encoding again
When there are no more documents on the software  the accountant checks his e mails and answers to some if needed

Either the product is a coli  in this case the system will write  big coli  followed by the number corresponding to the one written on the coli  or the system is an envelope  and the system will write  small coli  followed by the number corresponding to the one written on the envelope

The consumer takes the package and leaves
Many Carrefour stores have a small butcher shop

Krëfel is a company that works with stores in which the consumers can come to see the products
But the products are stored elsewhere and delivered directly to the customer s premises
The process starts when the customer orders the product in the store
The seller takes the data of the client and send the order at the central control center after that the stock has been checked
If there is an available stock the process can continue normally
If not the client has to pick up another good
Krëfel suggests a wide range of fridges to satisfy all the needs of the client
After that  an invoice is sent to the client if he cannot pay directly at the store
As soon as the payment is verified by the accounting department a message is sent to the central control center
Then the best way to deliver the product is designed to minimize the costs i e  the warehouse used  the combination of customer during the tour and the date
Indeed due to the pandemic the cost minimization is extremely important
The delivery center send a message to the client in order to verify the possible schedule of delivery
If it is not possible another date is suggested to the client
When the client accept the delivery schedule a message is sent to the delivery team with the instructions of the day
The process starts with the client ordering something on the website
Once the product basket is finished a payment is required to send the list at the shop
After the payment the shop receives the list of the products selected by the client
The order manager then notifies a worker to complete the entire basket of goods in the shop
As soon as the order is completed the basket of goods must be put in the fridge in the meantime
As you know the food products have to be storage in the fridge otherwise some bacteria can develop
In this case it is the shop that is designed responsible for this mistake
The worker then notifies the person in charge of orders
The latter marks the task as completed in the order book and sends a message to the customer at the same time
The customer  from that moment on  has to pick up the order within 24 hours

If the order is not picked up within the time limit  the worker has to put the food back on the shelves and the order manager will charge the client an extra 5€ with a request for confirmation of the previous order
If so the process starts again
If not  a refund is made
VPharma is a pharmaceutical company
The process starts when the ordering department send the order to suppliers
Suppliers take the order into account
Suppliers prepare and send the items
The items are transported by trucks
The receiving department receive the items
The receiving department check if quantities are right or if there is a damaged good
And encode the information into an internal software
In the case of wrong quantity or damaged good  the receiving department send a complaint to suppliers
Few times after the reception  the accounting department receive the invoice
The accounting department check if quantities on the invoice are correct regarding what the receiving department have encoded
If the invoice is correct  the accounting department encode it and put it as to pay
If the invoice is incorrect  the accounting department send another complaint to supplier  encode the invoice  and put it as to nonpay
At the end of each month  invoices marked as to pay are paid
Invoices marked as to non pay are paid if the company have received a credit note or the items missing
Bettolins soins infirmiers is a at home curing company

The nurse leaves to go to another patient
At the end of the day  the nurse encodes all doctor s agreement paper into a software
The software acts like an agenda and puts each patient at a different time of following days depending on how many cures they need
At the end of the month  the nurse sends how many times She has gone to each patient during the month to health mutual for being paid

A customer arrives

If the customer wants an item other than a personalized bouquet of flowers go directly to the checkout and proceed to the payment and give the item

Arrange the bouquet

If the container is labelled as great quality  it is send to a second hand shop
If the container is labelled as poor quality  it is send to a developing country
