The process starts when the client comes to the Health Mutuel s main hall
The customer sends a request for a needed service through the ticket machine
Health Mutual s receptionist receives the customer s request for a needed service
Then  the customer and the receptionist have to wait until it will be the customer s turn  after what the customer could go to the receptionist s window
The receptionist asks the client to provide personal information
The client provides the receptionist with his her personal information
The client s personal information could be provided by giving his her identity card or another relevant document
Receptionist receives the client s personal information
After what  the receptionist should determine if the client s request could be done by him her or if it is necessary to take an appointment with a consultant
On one hand If the request could be done by the receptionist  he she will do so and send the notification to the client about it
The client will receive the notification about his her realized request
On the other hand  if the request could not be done by the receptionist  the latter will take an appointment for the client with the consultant
After one of these steps  the receptionist will ask the customer to wait and if he she need anything else
On one hand  if the client needs something else  the process will restart at the  determine if the request could be done by the receptionist   from the  step 9
On the other hand  if the client answer is no  then he she will leave the Health Mutual and the request will be fulfilled for a client and for the receptionist
This business process starts when the client decides to build a new house
Client searches for an appropriate land  For example  the land in a client s preferred region which is situated not so far from his her home   > example sentence
Once the appropriate land found  the client takes contact with a chosen architect and sends a construction request demand to him her
Client sends all the information about the land to the architect and wait for his her response and approval   > details
The architect analyses the client s land choice in accordance with client s needs
The architect has 2 choices  to approve the chosen land or not
On one hand  if the architect does not approve the land  he will send the information about the non approval of the land to the client  The process will resume from the  step 5  for the architect
In this case  the client will receive the non approval of the land and will search for another one  therefore  the process will resume from the  step 2  for the client
On the other hand  if the architect approves the land  the client will receive a notification
In this case  the client will contact the bank in order to ask for a loan
Client receives a bank loan
In the meantime  the architect analyses the clients demand and needs in order to develop the prototype of a construction project
The architect sends the prototype version of the project to the client  The client receives the project prototype and then he she will decide to approve it or not   >details

On one hand  if the client does not approve the project s prototype  he she will notify the architect about it and will wait for a new prototype project version  the process will resume from the  step 13  for a client and from the  step 12  for the architect
On the other hand  if the client approves the project s prototype  he she will notify the architect about it  and the architect will receive the notification
The architect develops the final version of the project
The architect sends this project version to the communal house
The architect receives the project approval from the communal house
The architect sends the communal house approval to the client and the client receives it
The client validates the final project and the architect receives this validation
The architect sends a quote for his her work to the client and  at the same time  makes a call for tenders to several construction companies
Once these two operations are done simultaneously  the client sends the payment documents and therefore notifies the architect about it  The architect receives the payment
The architect receives the bids from the construction companies
The architect analyses these bids and chooses the most appropriate ones
The architect sends the most appropriate bids to the client  and the client receives it
The client analyses the bids
The client sends the bids  approval to the architect and pays them  The architect receives payment and the notification of approved bids
The architect asks for the construction services from the chosen construction companies
The architect receives the construction services
That is how the request for the house construction application ends for the client and for the architect
After that  the house construction is launched
Before playing a Basketball game  once a week  we gather information about different playing grounds by phone  email or on person
we check if pitches are available  after checking availability of the pitches
we choose the most suitable one based on price and location and book it by giving the booker s personal data such as first name  last name  etc
Then we gather the players  if we are fit to the required number of players
we go to the specified playing ground
If not we search for other players on a 1 hour window before the game
If players are gathered we go to the playing ground  if not we cancel the game
When we go to the pitch  we gather money to pay the required fees
if we don t have enough money we cancel the game
if we gather it we finally play the game
In order to rent a car for the weekend holiday  we start by searching for altered agencies  who provide this service
Then to efficiently select the best one  we filter them by price  service quality and ancient user s reviews
If an agency meets the required criteria  we contact it by phone or email  and check the availability of the wanted car
If the desired car meets our schedule  we give our personal data  if not we choose another car which meets our schedule  then give our data
if no car is meeting our schedule we contact another agency
If no agency fulfills our desire  we cancel the car rent
After giving our personal data  we get an email to pay the car fees including insurance
If the payment is accepted  we get an invoice with the car s location
If not  we retry the payment
If it is successful we go to the meeting place  if not the rent is cancelled
Phone group is a firm that provides Customer management services to many companies around the world
In order to ask for a day off within the organisation   the employee prepares a request and sends it to the service Manager by email
When the service manager receives the request  he she transfers it to the set supervisor
The set supervisor verifies the eligibility conditions
If the employee does not have enough leave balance  the set supervisor rejects the request
If the employee has enough leave balance  the set supervisor transfers the request to the Human Resources Management service
For example when the employee wants 2 days off and he only has a leave balance of 1 day   the request is rejected
The Human Resources Management service contacts the set supervisor for a confirmation of the request approval after receiving the request
If the set supervisor does not confirm the request approval   the request is rejected
If the set supervisor confirms the request approval  the Human Resources Management service checks the availability of the replacement staff
If the replacement staff is not available   the Human Resources Management service rejects the request
If the replacement staff is available   the Human Resources Management service sends them an email containing the slots
The replacement staff receive the email containing the slots
If the replacement staff does not confirm within 24 hours  the request is rejected
If the replacement staff confirms within 24 hours   the request is confirmed and the employee is notified by email
Having a double degree can be a very interesting experience
Student receive an information email concerning double degree programs from the Head of International relationships of HEC
15 days after  the Head of international relationships of HEC sends another email containing a link to an online meeting concerning double degree programs
The student participate in the online meeting in order to know the application details
The application procedure is easy and rapid
The student sends an email to the Head of International Relationships in HEC in which he specifies the double degree he is interested in
The Head of International Relationships verifies the students grades in order to check his her eligibility to the choosen program
If the student is not eligible   the Head of International Relationships in HEC rejects the application and notifies the student by email
If the student is eligible   the Head of International Relationships in HEC contacts the exchanges manager of the choosen uiversity for confirmation
If the exchanges manager of the choosen university does not confirm  the application is rejected and the student is notified by email
If the exchanges manager of the choosen university confirms  the application is accepted and the student is notified by email
This process is about the purchase of the ingredients in a shop
For example  you can go to the supermarket in the  rue Saint Gilles  in Liège
Before starting to cook  preheat the oven to 200°C
Take the potatoes to peel them
Once it is done  cut them into small cubes
Put your potato pieces in an ovenproof dish
Leave this dish on its side and cut the onions into small pieces
Add the onions  bacon and cream to the potato dish
Cut the Reblochon cheese in half lengthwise and place it on top of the dish
Based on your preferences  you can replace the Reblochon with Morbier cheese
Put your dish in the oven for 45 minutes
After this time  use potholders to remove the dish from the oven and place it on a trivet  the process is finished
The process starts with the publishing an announcer for recruitment
The announce ca be made on Facebook  Instagram or also on their website
Students interested in recruitment should send their CVs by email
HEC Advisory assigns all students who send in their CVs a date and time for a job interview
Each candidate has a job interview with the team of HEC Advisory
The HEC Advisory s team choose the best candidates
The best candidates are invited to participate to the resolution of a business case
The participants are divided into different teams
The teams have to resolve the case in maximum 3 hours
Once they have resolved the case  they make a presentation of their solution to HEC Advisory
After all the presentations  HEC Advisory choose the best candidates to enter the team
HEC Advisory chose the candidates on the basis of objective elements that they observed
The HR responsible call all the candidates to tell them if they are take or not  the process is then finished
Plouf Club is a swimming club where children learn how to swim
The process starts with an email from the parents in order to register their child ren
According to the child s level they can book 30min  45 min or 1h
The child and his parents enter in building
The coordinator takes the temperature and the presence of each child
The child changes on his own if he is over 9 years old or with a parent if he is under 9 years old
The child stays in the waiting area waiting for the swimming pool instructor
After his course the instructor picks up the child and give the course
The child learns for example to dive
At the end of the course the instructor brings the child back and returns in the swimming pool with another group
The child returns to the locker room and changes himself or with his parents
Once the child is dressed  he can leave the building and come back home
The internship has to be realised next year
The student looks for a company in which he is interested
For example  he can ask on a social media or participate at an event like the career night
The student sends his cover letter and resume to several big companies
For example  he sends his information to Deloitte or to KPMG
If the student s profiles match with the company they ask him for a first interview with a HR of the company
This interview lasts at least 30 minutes and consists of finding out more about the student and forming an initial opinion about him her
If this goes well  a second interview is scheduled
The second interview will be technical and will last at least 1h30
After that the company has to make its final decision and accept or not the student s internship
The student only has to wait for the company s response and can continue to look for others
My tennis club is offering summer camps for kids from 4 to 14 years old
The process begins at 8 30 when the instructors arrive at the club house
Then  they welcome the kids until 9 0
At this time  one of the instructors explains the days to the kids while the other are preparing the courts and the materials needed
By preparing the courts and materials  we understand taking the rackets and the exercises for the kids
Once everyone is on the courts  each instructor takes his group of kids until 10 30
At that time  each kid goes back to the club house
They sit down to eat their snack
Meanwhile  the instructors clean the courts
Once finished  the younger kids make drawing while older kids are playing another sport than tennis
At 12 00  everyone picks up his backpack$
Each kid leave the club house if they prove that one of their parent is there
If not  they have to wait
The process is over when each kid has left the tennis club
The process begins when the customer noticed it s time to do the change
He looks for an appointment on the website of the garage
The garage employee confirms the appointment on the website and the customers receives an email
This could happen whenever during the year
The day of the appointment  the customers drive until the garage
His car is taken over by the mechanic
The mechanic drives the car to the workshop and change the tires
In the same time  the customers is welcomed in the office of the garage
He can proceed the payments either by card  or by cash or he can receive an invoice
There is these three choice to improve customer s satisfaction
After the payment  the customer has to wait a few more minutes in the showroom
Either he just sits or he can look at the news cars exposed
After a few minutes  the change of tires is done and the customers can go back home
The process is then over
The process starts when CIBLE RH publishes a new job opportunity on its website
Interested applicants send their CV and motivation letters
CIBLE RH analyses the profiles of the candidates and selects three most interesting profiles
CIBLE HR uses a hiring software to analyse the CV and motivation letters
After which interviews are scheduled
Then the three selected candidates are informed about the details of the interview by email
These details concern mainly the place  date and time of the interview
If the candidates accept the details  then the interview is confirmed
If not  a reminder email is sent to the candidate in 72 hours
If the candidate still doesn t reply in 72 hours  his candidature is rejected and he is notified by e mail
One week after the interviews  CIBLE RH sends an offer letter to the candidate who has been hired
The candidate accepts the offer in 72 hours by sending an e mail to CIBLE RH  and the process is finished
RODIV HOTEL is a renown hotel in Malaysia
Its order to cash process is triggered when the Clerk receives a reservation request from a potential client by e mail
This reservation request includes arrival day  departure day and type of room requested
The Clerk registers the request and verifies the availability of the room
If the room is not available  the clerk rejects the request by sending a rejection e mail to the client
In case the room is available  the Clerk documents the request and sends a confirmation e mail to the client
The Clerk then fowards the reservation request to the Finance department for billing
The finance department establishes the bill and fowards it to the client with a link for online payment
If the client doesn t pay in 72 hours  the clerk cancells the reservation and notifies the client by e mail
Once the client pays the bill  the Finance department sends proof of payment to the clerk
The Clerk then confirms the reservation with the client by sending him an access code  and the process is fulfilled
The process starts when a department notifies the RH department regarding a vacated position by mail or phone  The RH department sets up a hiring team
The team generates a job description
The job description has a prioritized list  job requirements  qualifications  desired characteristics  and experience
The team advertises the job description through the company s website and social media platforms  for example  the team can publish the job description on Linkdin
The team receives applications by email  then  the team reviews the applications
if the candidate doesn t meet the minimum requirements for the position  the team eliminates the candidate
if not  the team schedules an interview with the candidate
Before the interviews  all candidates are subject to a background check  criminal record  employment history  credit checks
If there is something wrong within the background check  the team eliminates the candidate
Once the interviews with the potential candidates are completed
then  the team identifies their best choice  then  the team extends the offer letter   the salary  start date  policies
Negotiations are more likely to follow
If the candidate accepts the job  The company hires the candidate  if not  the team identifies their best choice again
The process ends by onboarding the new worker and welcoming him
The process starts when the person decides to buy a house
The person starts the research  reading web sites  newspapers  and magazines    then the person highlights interesting  houses
After that  the person analyses his financial situation  according to that  the person determines how much he can afford for a house
Then  the person finds a good estate agent
The estate agent does this job every day and has daily updated informations
The person starts touring homes in his price range
The person takes notes on all the homes he visits  little details  neighborhood
The person works with his  estate agent  they negotiate a the very good offer
Once the person and the seller have reached agreement on a price  the person arranges for a home inspection
Both the person and the seller receive a report regarding the house inspector s findings
If the report proves that there is material damage  then the person renegotiates the offer with the seller
if not  the person and the seller sign all of the paperwork required to complete the purchase
the process ends when the buyer moves to his new house
The process starts when a bookseller order books from a book provider
The books can be available or not
If they are not available  it means that it will be delivered later and so the process is delayed until it is available
The book provider checks if the books are physically available
An employee scans them to remove them from the stocks
An invoice is automatically created and sent by mail or post
The bookseller has 15 days to pay
If no payment is received within the delay  a reminder is sent
The next week  depending on the location of the store  the books are delivered on Wednesday or Thursday
15 days after the delivery  a return notice is sent
If some books aren t sold  then they are returned
An employee of the book provider checks physically if the books are returned
Sometimes it happens that there is a mistake and the quantities on the paper doesn t match with what is sent in reality
A credit note is sent to the bookseller through mail or post
The process ends with the reimbursement of the unsold books
The process starts when somebody calls the company
An employee answers the phone
If it is an existing customer  he is redirected to the right service
If it is a new registration  the employee asks for the client s information
Such as the name  birthdate  phone  address  EAN code  type of energy
If all of the information is given  then the registration process ends and the information are sent to the network manager
If one or more information is missing  the registration is on hold and nothing is sent to the network manager
The client has to recontact the company to give those data
If the client doesn t come back with the missing information after three days  a reminder is sent by mail
It happens that mails are redirected to the spam
Five days later  if nothing is given  an employee calls the client to see if the client can give the information
If the client gives the information the registration ends and the information are sent to the network manager
If he doesn t have them  he is asked to contact the network manager to get the missing information
Most of the time people don t know the EAN code of their house  which is necessary to precisely detect the point of supply
Twenty days later  if the client doesn t come up with the missing information  the registration is cancelled and a mail is sent to the client
SWDE is the Walloon water company  they take care of the Walloon network except for the city of Liege
The process starts when the customer has to turn off the water to change a tap
The customer decides to call SWDE s customer services department
They ask the customer some questions to guide them to the right department
The customer service department asks for the customer s number in order to best respond to his request
For example  the number 2021543729
The customer is then transferred to the repairs and renovations department
The department is composed of 5 full time staff
The department takes the request and starts the replacement process
After the call  the department checks the schedule of the workers
The workers are selected according to the customer s address
This address is found in the database by means of the customer number
When a time slot is found  an email is sent to the customer for confirmation
The customer can confirm or request another appointment
If he confirms the appointment  it is recorded in the agenda of the concerned workers
A notification is then sent to the warehouse to check the availability of the item  the valve
If the item is available  it is put aside for the workers
If the item is not available  an order is placed with the supplier
When the part is received the workers are notified
The motto of Delivroo is  good food in bed
It all starts when the customer decides to eat without going anywhere
The customer picks up his phone and opens the  Delivroo  application on his mobile phone tablet computer
If the customer does not have an account yet  he she has to create one
The data is then saved
If he already has an account  he can directly search for a restaurant he likes
For example  a fried hamburger with a coke or a taco
When he has chosen his meal  he proceeds to the order
To confirm the order  he has to pay the total amount
Once the order is confirmed a notification is sent to the restaurant to inform them of what to prepare
The restaurant has the possibility to refuse the order if it is no longer able to do so
In this case  the order is cancelled  the customer receives a message and a refund
If the restaurant accepts  Delivroo estimates the preparation time and contacts a delivery person who is in the vicinity
The delivery person receives a message with the address of the restaurant and the address of the customer
When the delivery person has taken the order from the restaurant  a notification is sent to the customer
The notification says   Get ready  your meal will arrive soon
Once the order has been delivered  the delivery fee is paid to the delivery person s account and the price of the meal is paid to the restaurant s account
Finally  a message of satisfaction is sent to the customer

Apple jam is a delicious and healthy option to eat along with different breads
To make apple jam  you will require 4 apples  1 cup of sugar and water
First  peel and cut the apples into small cubes
Next  place them in a shallow pan and fill it with just enough water to cover the apples
Then cook the apples until the pieces start to become soft and translucent
This can be done on the stove or in a microwave
Stick a knife into a few of the pieces to make sure they are cooked
Wait for the apples to cool off
Once they are at room temperature again  transfer the apples and water to a mixer
Add the sugar and blend until smooth
Add water if it is too thick
Once you get a smooth mixture  transfer it back to the pan and cook on a slow flame
Make sure to continuously turn the mixture while on the stove
If using a microwave  then heat at intervals of 45 seconds and turn the mixture in between
Do this until the mixture starts thickening and becomes gelatinous
Take the mixture off the heat or out of the microwave when it has reached a jam like consistency
Let the jam cool off in the fridge and enjoy!

Burger King is a fast food restaurant that serves all kinds of burgers  fries  desserts etc
There are about 40 shops in Belgium and I worked in one of them last summer
The process starts when the client is hungry and decides to eat a meal

Remove the individual parts of the drums from their covers
Prepare the positioning area by adding a rug
The rug prevents the drum set to slide while playing
Build up the drum set to the drummer s preference
Tune the snare drum and the toms
A bad tuning of the snare and toms can result in unpleasant sound during the concert
Order the various songs that will be played
Install the microphones to various parts of the drum set
Check the volume levels of every microphone
Do an overall soundcheck of the drum set
During the soundcheck  the sound engineer can see if some microphone volumes are set too high or too low
Do an overall soundcheck with the whole band
Adjust the levels again  if necessary
The drum set is ready for the concert

First  begin by removing your makeup thoroughly
For example  choose a mild cleansing milk
Wet your face lightly
Gently rub your face with a scrub
Rinse off with a soft cloth dampened in lukewarm water
Do a facial sauna or place your head over a basin filled with hot water for 15 minutes to open the pores
The steam will allow the pores to open  zero blackheads goal !
Once the pores opened  remove the blackheads by pressing the skin with a tissue
Spread the cleansing mask all over your face
This type of mask contains clay
Leave on for about 20 minutes
Rinse off the face with a soft cotton or a cloth soaked in lukewarm water
Apply a hydrating or radiance mask
The mask must be adapted to your skin type
Finish your facial care by applying your day cream

The Big Four is the nickname used to refer collectively to the four largest professional services networks in the world
They provide financial services throughout the world
First  an identification of the firm wishing to get services is mandatory  we need to know its activity and location
The identification process is done by the Onboarding department
The potential client has to provide all the documentation needed for the whole identification and AML process
Then there is the identification of the board of management
Afterwards a deep investigation concerning the identity of the UBO is done  Ultimate Beneficial Owners
Then an AML review is done by the AML department if all the identification are validated
This part is the longest and can last 2 days to 3 weeks regarding the size of the analyzed company
The potential client will then be checked regarding its independence with the firm  conflict of interest are not desirable  it is done by the Independence department
When all the precedent process are completed  every information if gathered and expose to a committee of acceptation in order to know if the firm accept or not that client
If refused  the client is or rejected or send back to the first step of identification for a better review
The firm will could not accept a client if his reputation would be at risk by having relations with him
With acceptation of the committee  the client is valid and business negotiations start regarding the services and the drawing of the contract starts
The team giving the service celebrate the acquisition and acceptation of a new client
Each year  the AML process will be done again for risky clients  each 2 years for moderate ones and each 3 years for riskless clients
When it s been a long time not seeing my family or friends  I go back to France

If there are still buses I take the 98 one for a 20min duration
I get off and walk for 15min and I am finally home

The Driving test in Liège take place at the Wandres Auto center
The process starts when the customer arrives with his guide in the parking lot
The customer enters and takes place in the line of the counter
The employee asks to the customer s and guide s papers
For instance  the customer must show the insurance  the conformity certificate of the car and their roadbook of 1500km fulfilled
The employee fills in the client s registration and asks for payment
The customer pays by cash or by card
After  the employee asks to the customer to go to the theory room
The customer takes a theory exam of 6 questions
After the theory exam  the examinator comes and steers the customer to their car
The examinator asks to the customer to demonstrate certain features of the car
For example  the examinator may ask how to turn on the headlights  where the brake fluid is located  and so on
The examinator asks to the customer to start the car and to follow the instructions
After 30 minutes on average  the examinator asks to the customer to return to the autocenter
The customer returns to the auto center and turns off the car
The examinator completes the pass or deferral paperwork
The process is finished

First  you have to get your key ready
Unlock your car and get in
Once inside your car  the first thing you have to do is to fasten your seatbelt
Then  check if all the mirrors are well positioned and at the same time check if your seat is in good position
You may want to start the radio but that s not a good idea
Before ignition  you have to check if the gearbox is in neutral position? If yes  you can start the car
If not  you have to clutch in before
Once the car is running  you have to release the clutch while pushing down the gas pedal at the same time if you already clutched before starting the car
If you started the car in neutral position  it is now the time to clutch in and set a gear
Once the gear is set  you release the clutch and push down the gas pedal together

Rue Neuve in Brussels is great for shopping
The process starts when all of a sudden  a griel gets her purse ripped off
She watch the suspect running away
She then asks a pedestrian to dial 101 to alert the police
An operator picks up and the woman gives him a description of her thief
The operator tells her that a team will be dispatched to the scene as soon as possible
A response team arrives within 5 minutes and takes the woman s statement
At the same time  another team searches the surrounding streets for the suspect
If the suspect is found  he is arrested and taken to the police station
Then  the stolen bag is returned to the owner
In some cases  the bag is found on the suspect but is empty
If not  the surveillance cameras in the surrounding area are analysed and a wanted notice is created
In both cases  the lady comes to the police station to make her statement
If she was injured during the robbery  she is offered a visit to the hospital
If her attacker has not been found  she will be kept informed of the outcome of the investigation

Business process description of a Belgian company which manufactures macarons
The process begins when the sales manager receives a call  an email or a demand directly from the website
He registers the order in a software used across the company
The production manager receives a notification that an order is arrived
He checks if there are the available components in the stock to produce the required macarons
There are different range of macarons  like sweet macarons  savoury macarons  gourmet macarons
f the components are available  the production can begin but if not the manager has to order the components to a supplier and the production will be able to begin once the order is received
After the production is done  the macarons are placed in a cold storage for at least one day and the production manager notify the software that the production is completed
24 hours later  the packaging manager receives the notification and allocates the work to the workers
Once the packaging is done  the sales manager is notified and he contacts the delivery company to come to take the merchandises and to deliver them to the customers
The delivery company tells the sales manager when the macarons are delivered
Either the completion time from the order received from the client to the delivery time respected  so the client must pay the total amount
Or the delay is not respected and the company makes a discount
The process is completed when the company receives the money
Business process description of a dry cleaning and sewing shop

The first service process begins the following day  the item goes through the wash machine and the dryer
Then the third step ironing is done the following day
These three operations are done in two days
The employee calls the client that it s done just after the ironing step and he can come pick up his good
But if the client brings his item at the shop on Friday or on Saturday  the process is delayed by two days because the shop is closed on Sunday and on Monday
The second service process  sewing  is done by a tailor
The tailor comes each Thursday to pick up and return goods
The client is informed by a call when the shop received the item from the tailor
He comes bring it
These two services stop when the client comes and pays in the shop
Stephanie is an interior designer
As a freelancer  she advertises on social networks

For example  a virtual bathroom with the decoration elements they want
Once the plan is finalized and validated  Stephanie orders the furniture and paint from the suppliers
When she has received all the material  she goes to the customer s home to start her work
She applies the 1st layer of paint
After 48 hours of waiting  she put the second coat of paint
Once the second coat of paint is dry  48h   she starts to assemble the furniture and the layout of the room
Once the work is finished  she presents it to the client who validates or not the result
If the client validates  Stephanie sends the invoice
If not  she starts a new layout in collaboration with the client
Once this second attempt is validated  Stephanie send the invoice
There is a process to follow in order to become a federal officer in the Belgian Scout Federation
First of all  this function is accessible to people who are at least 21 years old
In order to be able to access this function  it is nevertheless necessary to follow trainings
The first training of 4 days can either be done at the age of 18 years when you are a pioneer in a scout unit  Pi Days   or at the age of 19 years when you are a section leader  T1
The process start when you do you first training
Once this first training is finished  Pi Days or T1   you start the 2nd training of 3 days  T2
After T2  a practical training of 150 hours is planned  which corresponds more or less to a 10 days camp
Once the internship is completed  we move on to the 3rd stage of training of 4 days  the T3
After the T3  a time of unity  TU  is foreseen  this one will last one WE  and will lead to the obtaining of the certificate of scout leader
Once the certificate is obtained  the trained person can become a  come and see  within a unit team for 3 months
After the 3 month period  an activity interview meeting is scheduled with the team s federal animator
At this meeting  you can either confirm that you want to become a federal manager or decline
If you refuse the position  you can either take another position within the federation or stop scouting

DELHAIZE is a Belgian supermarket chain that offers student jobs every year
The process starts when the student applies on the company s website
The recruitment manager receives the application and reviews it  The application is rejected if the candidate s profit does not match the one the company is looking for and the process ends
In case the profit matches  the recruiter schedules an interview with the candidate by sending an invitation
Once the interview is over  the recruiter judges and decides whether the application is accepted or rejected
If the application is rejected  a message is sent to the unfortunate candidate and the process ends
If the application is accepted  an offer is sent to the candidate
After receiving the offer  the candidate examines it in turn
If the offer is not satisfactory  he rejects it and the process ends
In case of satisfaction  he is recruited and the process ends
EUROFRUITS is a fruit and vegetable distributor serving mainly restaurants and fruit shops in the greater Namur region
Being perishable supplies  it sometimes happens that the products shipped do not meet the customers  requirements
The refund process is as follows
The customer sends a request for a refund
The company receives the refund request
After the request is received by a customer service agent  a refund file is created if the customer does not have one
Refund requests of less than €100 are automatically credited to the customer s account
Requests for more than 100 euros must be approved by the supervisor
A refund is automatically credited to the client s account
If the process is not completed after 7 days  the agent must send an email to the client indicating that the request is being processed
After 30 days  the application is automatically approved
If there is a refusal  the client is informed by email
If the application is approved  the customer is informed by email and the process is completed
Uber Eats is a mobile application which allows to order food from restaurant and fast food
The deliveries are made by independent drivers
The process starts when the customer chooses a restaurant and make an order
For example  the customer order sushi from Sushi Shop
The restaurant is notified that a customer made an order on the Uber tablet
The employee of the restaurant prepares the order
The Uber Eats application send a notification to the nearest available drivers
The driver receives the order and choose to accept it or to refuse it
If he refuses it  the order is sent to another driver
When the driver accepts the order  he goes to the restaurant to pick up the order
When he took the order  he clicks on  Start the delivery  and the customer is notified that his order is on the way
The customer can follow the driver on the Uber Eats application
The drivers can deliver by car  by scooters or by bike
When the driver has delivered the order  he can evaluate the customer and click on  Order delivered  and can accept now new orders

When the customer has received his order  he can evaluate the driver and if the driver has already confirmed the delivery  he has X minutes to confirm that he received his order and the drivers is paid for his delivery
If after X minutes he does not confirm the delivery  the order is automatically confirmed and the drivers is paid  the process is finished

If he has not a fidelity card  the employee asks him if he wants one or not
If yes  the customer received a fidelity card
The customer takes his car and leave the carwash  the process is finished

To start your registration  go to Facebook com

Set a password of at least six characters containing letters  numbers and special characters
The longer the password  the more difficult it will be to discover
Next  enter your date of birth and check the box for your gender
Then click on the green  Register  button

Your profile picture will allow your friends to recognise you
Finally  click on  Save  to finalise your registration
Congratulations!
Cheesecake is THE new trendy pastry
To start  preheat your oven to 180°C
Next  grease the bottom of the pan you will use to bake your cheesecake
Once this is done  crumble the biscuits into a bowl and mix with the melted butter
Spread the mixture on the bottom of the dish
Set aside in the fridge
In the meantime  beat the cottage cheese with a whisk and add the flour  eggs and sugar
You can add lemon peel or vanilla if you like
These will give your cheese cake more flavour
Carefully place the mixture on the crumbled biscuits
Bake for one hour
Finally  leave to cool before unmoulding
Thank you for following my recipe!
This is the process of offering a gift for a birthday
The process start when I decide if I will buy the gift in one of the online applications or in a store
If I m busy  I use the online applications  if I m not  I buy in a store
If I decide to buy the gift online  I take a look in all online sites to find the gift corresponding to my budget and the offers
If i choose what I m going to buy  the application check if I have already entered my data  if not  the application demands my data
Then  I enter my credit card data and execute the payment  if I have enough money to execute the operation  then it will be executed  if not  the application will cancel my demand
Aftrewards  if the operation went well  I choose if I sign on the arrival of purchased item or not
Then the application gives me an estimated waiting time to receive the item
Finally  when the time of reception of the item arrives  the deliverer comes to the address indicated in the application to give me the article
I sign in his phone or in a paper that I received my order
If I decide to buy the gift in a store  I go to see several stores
When I choose what i m going to buy
Then I choose if I m going to pay by cash or by credit card
If I pay by cash  I give the salesperson the price of the item
If not I pay by credit card  I enter the card code  and I take the gift
In the end  I give my friend the gift

If I pass the interview  I start my internship directly  if not I will have to see another company

The process begins when someone is declaring a damage for which he wants to be compensated
For that  he has several ways to state the incident
The choice will impact the way the clerk will address the issue
The claim management officer will firstly check if the person declaring is an actual client of Ethias
For the application or the website channel  this check will be done by the person itself

Obviously  the victim must be a client of Ethias in order to be compensated  if not  the process ends here by informing the victim the steps that he should follow in order to be eligible for the coverage
In some cases  when the incident is claimed by phone  the clerk starts by asking the victim if he or she needs some support such as a tow truck for instance
Then the victim will share key information with the officer of the claims management department to make the declaration
Whether it is by phone or by mail  the information is transcribed into the IT system
If the declaration is done via the form in the application or website of Ethias  the information ends up directly in the IT system
After that  the case is opened for the client and the process may continue with the case instruction and examination to see if it meets the conditions to compensate the victim

To this end  the clerk will assess if there is a matter of liability in the case or not  as well as checking if the client contract covers the damage that occurred and assessing the level of damage by means of experts or by his experience
At the same time  the case handler decides which type of reservation the case should follow
In the perspective of an actuarial reservation  he informs the actuarial department by sending the case to it
In the other perspective  the clerk defines the amount to reserve by himself and sends it to the actuarial department to be approved

The case handler sees if the coverage conditions are fulfilled  that is to say that for cases of engaged liabilities the client should be considered liable  otherwise it s not up to his insurance to compensate
The other condition is that the contract should cover the damage
In the end  a notification with the outcome will be sent to the client and if these conditions are well fulfilled  Ethias will compensate for the damage
The case is finally settled or unsettled

In order to understand the reservation process better  it is necessary to clarify its purpose in the context of an insurance company  reservation allows Ethias to deal with future compensation needs by means of statistical computation techniques   for example  someone broke his leg this year and because of that  he might have complications like a need for a surgery years later
Then  his insurance will have to compensate him once again
That s why  on the insurance side  they have to make a reservation in order to be prepared for these cases
As seen in the claims management process  the clerk decides which type of reservation is needed based on his evaluation
Actuarial reservation only deals with cases considered as recurrent and with a higher level of generality  also  they are most of the time short term cases
Otherwise  the clerk determines and evaluates by himself the amount to reserve but still sends it to the actuarial department for approbation
So for this process  when the claim management officer informs the actuary that the case needs an actuarial reservation  the latter collects all the data regarding the case by means of a database
Then he analyzes it in order to fix new hypotheses which will be used for computation
This computation is handled by a mathematical program
Nevertheless  to find which model to use  the actuary follows precise guidelines and rules
The outcome of this computation will be checked by the actuarial control 4
If changes are needed  the actuary will adjust his model and repeat the computation
After the approbation by the actuarial control  the assessment of the case is sent to the accounting department in order to be accounted for
It s up to the actuary to communicate the reservation to the accounting department
To initiate this process  a product manager from the marketing or sales department requests to price a product
Then the actuary team of the tarification department will gather data and statistics about the type of incidence that the service covers
The Ethias database is filled with information in order to develop a technical model of tarification to take into account the specific risks and give a first price for the premium

But this price does not always comply with the market demand and customer needs  this is the reason why the actuary team and the product manager exchange information to compute a model more suitable for the market
This second version of the model will be sent to the actuarial control in order to be reviewed and to check the perspective of profitability with the business plan
When the review is done  if changes are needed the actuary team takes care of remodelling it and shows the model to the actuarial control once again until it s validated by it
This validation must be followed by the agreement of all the stakeholders that are linked with this pricing process
Their agreement is necessary before establishing the tariff and sending it to the product manager
The underwriting process begins when a demand for insurance coverage is perceived by the sales department
This demand is sent either by a peer to peer procedure between Ethias and the organisation  by a broker as an intermediate of the concerned company or by a tendering procedure on public markets
This distinction doesn t change the process in essence  but rather in the outcomes and the channel of communication
Then the demand is transferred into the CRM system of Ethias either by the sales officer or  in some cases  automatically
Next  the sales officer checks if this demand comply with the business guidelines of Ethias in strategic or relationship terms

Generally  the case complies and continues its path towards the underwriting department to follow two successive analysis procedures  first  an acceptance analysis which is made in order to make the decision to keep such demand or to reject it
If the underwriter doesn t accept it then the process ends  otherwise he proceeds  in a second time  to a tarification analysis
These two phases are modelled as subprocesses which consist of multiple tasks that should be done before setting the tariff and the offer
In addition  a competence scheme helps to decide whether the offer needs to be agreed by two other third parties  BOL and HAC  or not  depending on the offer
They can eventually ask for adjustment before pursuing the process
Later on  if the third parties agreed when needed  the underwriter decides the channel through which he will make the offer

Considering the circumstances  he has 3 possibilities  the offer could either be led directly towards the client through the CRM system  be led to an account manager  ACMA  that will defend the offer in front of the call for tenders or be placed in a share application for the sales department that will handle it from there
The outcome of the offer will be communicated through the same channel used to make the offer

The last tasks for the underwriter are to settle all the paperwork and then  depending on the outcome  to classify the case or not  if the outcome is negative  he must do so  if it is positive  the onus is not on him to do that and the process is over
This process begins when a client requests insurance coverage
He has the choice to fill in the subscription form digitally or to have contact with a clerk in an agency or via phone call
The sales officer of the front office will define what services the customer needs and check if he is already a client in Ethias
If it s not the case  the clerk affiliates him by asking for personal information

Then the officer will check the client s incident data in DataSure  which is a database to centralise all the declared incidences from any insurance company  in order to decide if he is eligible for the services needed
If he is not eligible  the rejection is communicated directly after this verification
Either way  the clerk makes the first quotation with the information gathered and hands in to the client or sends it via letter or email if the request is made via phone call
The client reviews it  fills it with extra information needed to establish any contracts and sends it back via the channel of his choice
If it is physically  then the clerk decides if it meets the criteria of acceptance by analysing the risk
The rejection is also communicated to the client after this verification
If accepted  the clerk makes changes if needed by taking into account the review of the client and the extra information
Then the contract is printed and given to the client and waited to be signed
If it is digitally  the back office takes care of making the verification with the criteria and establishing the contract by taking into account all the data
All this procedure is simplified if the client firstly decides to fill the subscription digitally
For that he needs to be affiliated and this is made possible thanks to the website or the application
The subscription form and client s data are sent directly to the back office to be evaluated and analysed
The officer checks with the criteria of acceptance and decides whether to send a rejection or to establish and send the contract to be signed by the client
The process starts when an employee is sick or absent for whatever reason

The first step of the process has to be done by the employee  he has to send his medical certificate to the human resources and at the  same time   he has to contact them in order to inform them of the duration of its absence
Thanks to this  the human resources can start their own process in which they try to replace him by someone
Then  after both of these tasks have been completed  the next tasks will mainly concern the human resources department
They have to sort out the different types of medical certificates  check if they are certificates without pathologies or certificates with pathologies
On the one hand  if and only if the certificate is without any pathology  the human resources employee has to check it and verify if the certificate is valid
Then  he has to verify some little things like the start of the absence  the end of it  and then he has to send a mail to SPCM to prevent them

Following this  at the same time  he has to encode this absence in the system in order that all the organization can be aware of the absence of the employee and he has to notify the medical advisor too  and then the medical advisor will have to choose whether the veracity of this absence must be checked or not
On the other hand  if and only if this certificate contains pathologies  the human resources employee has to send it directly to the  Service Provincial de contrôle médical  and has to fulfill a form
After that  the SPCM checks if the certificate is correct and if there is any problem
After that  he then gives his accord to the organization to encode this
So  the human resources employee can encode this in the database

Afterwards  at the same time  they have to notify the medical advisor  and then the medical advisor chooses to check the veracity of this absence or not  and  the human resources employee can check the date  the absence  etc
After that  in addition they receive the acknowledgement of receipt and finally they can put the certificate in the HR certificate folder and the process is over
The process starts at the end of the month when it is time to pay the different employees in the company
We should note that almost the entire process is carried out by human resources

Firstly  at the same time  the human resources employee is doing 4 different tasks  which are  check for extra hours  check leaving request  check attendance system in order to know how many hours the employee worked and then check it with the system  Unitime
Finally  he checks sickness  so if an employee was absent and then uses HR Accent in order to verify this
When all these 4 steps are finally done  he writes a recap  with all the information so he can export them to Securex
Securex checks the feedback and sends it to the human resources
After receiving the feedback from Securex  the human resources employee treats the document in order to make a proposal for the salary
After receiving the proposition  there is a question within the HR   are we agree with this proposition?  If no  the process restarted at the proposition of wage slip
If the response is yes  we can continue the process
Human resources can then send the payment permission to Securex and wait until the reception of Securex agreement
Subsequently  several things have to be done at the same time  we are going to describe them branch by branch
Firstly  in the first branch he receives the  décompte de paye  and then prints it in order to send the file to the employee
Afterwards  there is a question   Is there any contestation?  If there is no contestation  we can continue and finalize the process with the acceptation of Securex payment
But  if there is a contestation  we have to ask the CEO what to do with it and then a new process starts
Finally  on the other branch  things that need to be done first are to ask Securex to prepare the invoice  then we are waiting until Securex creates it  and sends it
After this  there is another question   Are we sending this to accounting or not?  If the answer is  yes   we can accept Securex s payment and the process ends
And if no  once again we have to ask the CEO what to do
This process starts when an application is sent by a candidate to the HR which do a first sorting and then a second one
After this  the first interview take place

Then we are in the first question which is  Is this a key position or not?  If yes  we need to know if we need complementary assessments    if yes  a specialist office makes a couple of tests and then sends the results to the HR
After this  we conclude whether it is okay or not
If it is not  we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that
We therefore destroy these data
But if it is okay  we arrive to the second interview which is important
If it is not necessary to get more assessments  we can go directly to the second interview
So  at this moment  we are at the same point
After the interview  there is a selection  if the candidate is not selected  then we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that  and destroy its data
But if the candidate is selected  then HR sends a notification to the applicant and welcomes him as a new worker
If it is not a key post  we are directly in the step of selection
So  if the candidate is not selected  then we can dismiss the application and inform the applicant of that  and destroy its data
But if the candidate is selected  then HR sends a notification to the applicant and welcomes him as a new worker
The process starts when the financial department picks up an invoice in order to pay it
It should be noted that the file in question is recuperated in the ISABEL system
Firstly  the financial department employee prints the details of payment
After this  he shows the file to the financial director
Afterwards  he needs to classify the invoices according to whether they are above 150 000 euros or under 150 000 euros
When we are under 150 000  the financial employee just has to inform the HR department
When we are above 150 000  he has to ask the financial director to find out if it is okay
After these steps  we follow the same path in both cases  and the process stays located in the financial and accounting department
Then  the employee verifies the liquidity on the account in order to know if there are no problems with the treasury

After that  he can send money to the bank account  send an email to CBC bank with the details of payment and finally register the payment in the SAP system  before ending with the receiving of the account statement
This process starts when a client asks for an intervention
This request is directly registered in a file
Then  it must be checked if the intervention is included in the contract

If it is not  the client must be asked whether he agrees with the financial part and then the client must respond to this in order for the organization to get his feedback  If he doesn t agree  the process stops
But if he agrees  the organization can define the costs of the intervention
If yes  the organization can define the costs
After this  at that moment we are on the same track  it should be chosen if we need an internal quote or an external one
We then arrive to 2 different questions  The first one is   Do we need an accord regarding the quote?      If the answer is  yes   the approbation of the client has to be asked
If his answer is that it is okay  he must be informed about the start of the intervention
Then the intervention is finished
But if he refuses the quote  the process ends again
If the answer is  no   the client must be informed about the start of the intervention and also when it will be finished

The process starts when a customer makes a request to open close the P1 S1 port  these are ports on the smart meter that allow the customer to connect their application on which they can consult their energy consumption in real time
The call is received by an interlocutor  called Connexio  working for a defined network distribution manager  in our case for ORES obviously
The Connexio will then control whether the customer is addressing the correct DNM using an identification database
If it is the wrong DNM  the Connexio informs the customer and the call ends
Once the DNM check has been carried out  he will proceed to a process check

If it is a High Voltage process  the customer is redirected to another service  otherwise if the process is Low Voltage  the Connexio identifies the requester thanks to the database of municipalities and social housing then controls the verbal offer
If it is not a verbal offer  the request is transferred to the  Connection Work  process
If it is a verbal offer  the process continues and the Connexio controls the file

If the file is existing  he informs the client and the process ends  otherwise  he communicates the price of the service to the customer and reads the GDPR disclaimer in case of an opening  then waits for the client s response
If the client accepts  a file is created
Otherwise the file is immediately closed and the process ends
After having created the file  the Connexio asks if the client is able to receive a remote operation  if he is not able  he asks whether the preparatory work is the client s responsibility

If he is able  is the client s request unique? If the client s request is not unique  he asks if the preparatory work is the client s responsibility  otherwise he asks directly what type of appointment to make
Concerning the preparatory work  if they are not the client s responsibility  then the Connexio asks what type of appointment to make

But if they are the responsibility of the customer  the Connexio informs the customer about the preparatory work  he waits for a response  if the customer does not accept  the file is closed and the process ends
If he accepts then he also asks what type of appointment to make

There are two types of appointments  The first one is if remote operations work  from June 2020   the Connexio sends confirmation to the customer but also to the control room that the thing has been taken into account
The control room receives this remote operation request for opening   closing port P1   S1 and the process is terminated

The second one is if the technician has to come to the customer s house  the Connexio controls the duration of the intervention  he schedules an appointment  if the intervention cannot be scheduled  the Connexio records the non schedulable intervention request and the call ends
After scheduling the appointment  he sends the appointment confirmation to the client  waits for the appointment confirmation
After receipt  he sends the work order to the technician
The technician receives the file and the process ends
The process is separated in 2 lanes  fieldworker and Work control OSP
The process starts with the reception of a request to install a smart meter for the activation of prepayment mode
All the processes arrive at the same gateway so I will describe each process up to the point of intersection and then explain what happens after
1  The customer was present and another customer was present
If the customer wants a recovery  they process it to a recovery form
If the customer doesn t want a recovery then they see if it is their first visit  a  2  Another customer was not present and the customer accepts the installation
b They check the communication network coverage
If the communication network coverage is adequate they check for fraud
If there is a suspected fraud they send the information to the fraud department and they wait for the attention return from the fraud service which sends an end signal to fraud management
c  After that  whether there is fraud or not  if there is not a smart technical impossibility they replace the meter with a smart meter
If there is a smart technical impossibility and an electromechanical technical impossibility they send the information of non execution of the installation for technical impossibility
If there is not an electromechanical technical impossibility they put a budget meter and activate prepayment mode
If the communication network coverage is not adequate and there is a possibility for deporting the antenna  they move the antenna to another area covered by the network and follow  c
If there is no possibility for deporting the antenna they check the electromechanical technical possibility  such as in c
Another customer was not present and the customer does not accept the installation
If the client is electro sensitive then the process goes directly to the checking of the electromechanics technical impossibility  in the c
If the client is not electro sensitive and it is their  a  first visit the process goes directly to the point of intersection
If it is not their  a  first visit but it is their second visit and the meter installation is possible before shutdown then the process continues to point  b
If the meter installation is not possible before shutdown and a meter cut is possible  2 things happen simultaneously
The first is checking if the meter installation is possible  if yes it goes to  b  if not it goes to the point of intersection
The second is to send the cutout start execution request to the meter and then wait for the message of the smart meter cut back
If there is no cancellation request they perform the cut on the meter

d  After that an effective cutoff confirmation is filed which sends a message to the customer then they send the effective cutoff information which lead to the intersection point and  e  in the Work control OSP lane receiving information on the execution of cuts which send an end signal of management of cut returns
f  If there is a cancellation request the process goes to the intersection point
If a meter cut is not possible  g  they check the possibility of a network cut
If a network cut is possible they send the request to start the execution of the network cut then wait for the message to start network cut back
If there is a cancellation request the process arrives at  f  and if not they execute the cut network then follow  d

If a network cut is not possible they send the non cut information which simultaneously lead the process to the intersection point and in  h  the work control OSP lane receive the information about non execution of cuts which send an end signal of post administration
3  The customer was not present and it is the first visit
If the meter is not accessible the process goes directly to the intersection point
If the meter was accessible  they check the communication network coverage
i  If the communication network coverage is adequate they check for fraud
If there is a suspected fraud they send the information to the fraud department and wait for the attention return from the fraud service which sends an end signal to fraud management
j  After that  whether there is fraud or not  if there is not a smart technical impossibility the meter is replaced with a smart meter and the process goes to the intersection
If there is a smart technical impossibility and an electromechanical technical impossibility the information is sent of non execution of the installation for technical impossibility
If there is not an electromechanical technical impossibility they put an electromechanics budget meter and activate prepayment mode
If the communication network coverage is not adequate and there is a possibility for deporting the antenna  the antenna is moved to another area covered by the network and follow  j
If there is no possibility for deporting the antenna they check the electrical technical possibility  such as in j
4  The customer was not present and it is not the first visit
If it is their second visit and a meter installation is possible before shutdown they follow  i
If it is not their second visit or it is their second visit but the meter installation is not possible before shutdown  they check if a network cut is possible
If yes  they send a request to start execution of the network cut and wait for a message of network cut back

If there is a cancellation request the process goes to the intersection point and if not  they cut the installation  file an effective cutoff notice which sends a message to the customer and send confirmation of effective shutdown which leads the process to the intersection point and in the work control OSP lane  following  e
If the network cut is not possible the information is sent of the non execution of the cut which lead the process to the intersection point and in the work control OSP lane  following  h
All of these lead to one gateway  after that they complete the worksheet
If the client is present  they sign the worksheet and if they are not a calling card is left for the customer which sends a message to them
Both of them lead to saving the worksheet and ending the process in the Work control OSP lane with post administration
This process is divided into 5 lanes  planned works  technical solution officer  supervisor  manager and CTM coordinator
The process starts at planned works when an appointment s planning is needed
First thing is to know if it is a grid construction work or not
If it is not a grid construction work  planned works assess if it is a civil engineering operation
If it is a civil engineering operation  they find out if there is an authorization or an information request  a
If it is not a civil engineering operation  is it an individual planning?  b  If it is a grid construction work that is needed  the file is sent to the technical solution officer
1  Planned works wait for the period defined in the order then check if there is a request for authorization or information
a  If it is an information request  planned works show the levelling zone and encodings to Powalco and then check KLIM and CICC and the process goes on
If it is an authorization request  they check if the authorization has been received
If it has been received  the process goes on  if it hasn t  planned works contact the competent authorities again to receive the authorization  then the process goes on
Planned works then figure out if there s a presence of KLIM CICC
If there is  the file is sent to the CTM coordinator  2  and planned works wait for the CTM coordinator s feedback
When the feedback is received  the process goes on
*  If there is not a presence of KLIM CICC  planned works find out if it is an individual planning
b  If it is an individual planning  the process goes on
If it is not an individual planning  they form the batches  transmit a list to the contractor and inform the client and the process goes on
c   *  Planned works then contact the client to arrange an appointment  they make the client aware of the preparatory work and then plan the appointment with them
They send a confirmation email to the client
If the reply received is negative  planned works contact the client again
c  If the reply is positive  planned works assess if the work is planned on a contractor
If it is  planned works prepare the file that will be sent to the contractor and send it to him
Then the process is done and a signal is sent to the process  Execute the work
If it is not  the file is sent to a technician and planned works assess if it is a civil engineering operation
If it is not a civil engineering operation  the process is done and a signal is sent to the process  Execute the work
If it is a civil engineering operation  planned works send the file to the contractor to carry out civil engineering
The process is then done and a signal is sent to the process  Execute the work
1  When the technical solution officer gets the file  they get back the file s investment cronos and check the CTM
If there is a CTM file  it is sent to the CTM coordinator  2  and the process goes on
If there is not a CTM file  the process goes on
The technical solution officer adjusts the file   d  asks for authorization  inform planned works of the theoretical period  *
The officer finally transfers the file to the supervisor and his part is over
When the supervisor gets the file  he checks if the authorization is received
If it is not received  the process goes back to the officer

d  If it is received  the supervisor executes the construction work  foresees the end of the work and informs the manager  which gets the info  then sends the file to the manager and the process is done
The manager gets the file  foresees the end of the work  executes the operation work  informs planned works of the end of the works  *  and then the operation work is done
2  The CTM coordinator gets the file  contacts the other recipients  visits the work site  creates a report and sends the feedback to planned works
He then informs the technician and the contractor and the CTM is managed
The two main ORES services involved in the work execution process are the  planned works  department and the executing agent working in parallel
Three other ORES actors play a lighter role  namely the  design office    supervision  and  local logistics manager
Executing agent  The process starts with the receipt of the file
Then either civil engineering works are required or not

If they are required  the agent plans them  informs the  planned works  of the civil engineering opening date  1   then carries out the inventory of fixtures  executes the earthworks and finally confirms the execution of the earthworks to the  planned works   2
Otherwise  nothing happens
After that  the executing agent tries to reach the client 15 minutes before his departure and then goes to his home
If the client can be reached and is present  he carries out the inventory of fixtures

If the client is not present at first  the agent tries to reach him but if he is still unreachable  the executing agent then leaves a calling card  calls the BOPW  encodes the mobile data and finally signs the report
The Process ends in the management of the nonexecuted
After the inventory of fixtures  the agent checks whether additional work at the client s request is necessary  if not he can directly check the certificate of conformity
If any work is required  the agent looks whether he needs BOPW information
If so  he will request it and wait for confirmation
In case of refusal  he checks the certificate of conformity
In case of confirmation or if BOPW information is not required  he informs the customer of the costs  asks for his agreement  carries out the work and finally checks the certificate of conformity
After checking the certificate of conformity  he checks the power and then jointly measures the column and replaces the meter and the parameter

In the event of a problem at the time of replacement or parameter setting  the agent informs the local logistics manager  3   if the problem concerns only one meter the operation is repeated  otherwise an electromechanical meter is installed  then the customer is informed and the agent answers any questions in the same way as if the parameter setting was carried out correctly
After that  if the LED confirms the functionality
Then the meter is switched on  otherwise it is left switched off

Then  he draws up an inspection plan which he sends to the Ores drawing office  4   enters the connection and counting data  confirms the materials used  draws up the output inventory and has the customer sign the report

If civil works are required  the agent plans the closure of the civil works  informs the  planned works  of the closure date  5   plugs up the holes  repairs in a definitive manner  makes the inventory of fixtures and finally confirms the completion of the repair to the  planned works   6
Finally  his last task is to encode the internal services in the case of internal services or to encode the internal services in the case of entrepreneurial work
The process ends by sending the file to the post administration
Planned work  The process begins with the planning of the worksite

Then  if civil engineering works are required  the  planned works  department receives the civil engineering opening date from the executing agent  1   the department then sends the civil engineering dates to the client  waits and finally receives confirmation of the earthworks by the executing agent  2
If no civil engineering works are required  the  planned works  department informs the client by sms of the date of the works 48 hours in advance
The department then receives the execution information
If the execution is not carried out  the process ends and the  prepare for execution  process begins
If it has been carried out  there is a waiting period

Finally  again if civil works are required  the  planned works  department receives the civil works closing date from the executing agent  5   the department then sends the civil works closing dates to the client  waits  receives the confirmation of the civil works closing from the executing agent  6  and finally updates the data in the POWALCO software
If there is no civil engineering  nothing happens
The process is then completed towards post administration
The drawing office  The process starts with the reception of the plan from the executing agent  4  and is then completed towards post administration
Monitoring The process starts with the reception of the date of the works  then the service ensures the supervision of the building sites and the process is finished with supervised building sites
Local logistics manager  The process starts with the reception of the message from the executing agent  3   then he processes the request and the process ends
The process starts at planned works when a technical visit is needed
If a visit without appointment  V1  is needed  planned works transfer the request to a technician and waits for feedback with the info concerning the V1
While planned work is waiting  a technician gets the request  carries out the visit and transfers info to planned works before being done with V1
When planned works get the V1 info  they can move on and prepare a file for a technical visit  V2
If a V1 is not needed  planned works directly prepare a file for a technical visit
Planned works then plan V2 with the client
After  they send a request to agents to know their availability
When the agents get the request  they process it taking into account geographical and technical skills and send back their availabilities to planned works
After receiving the agents  availability  planned works confirm the appointment with the client and send the file to a technician
They then wait for feedback while the technician gets the request  carries out a technical visit and sends their feedback
When the feedback is received  planned works handle it and then assess if civil engineering is required
If it is not required the processing is done
Otherwise  the feedback is sent to the contractor and the processing is done

The subscription process is facilitated by the digital transformation  in usual context the customer and the company are engaged into an endless mail exchange demanding the documents for the subscription
Thanks to Flora a new client only needs to enter some information about his property and his insurance fee is automatically calculated using the dimension and the location of his property

If the new client is not in the defaulters  database  there is no need for an employee to take part in the process  the contract and insurance details will be automatically digitally created and sent to the customer

If the client is indeed in the defaulter s database  Flora needs to conduct a short investigation to determine if they accept the client or not before finishing the process following the classical way
By using this process  customers are now able to modify their contract online  following a move for instance  by simply entering details about their new property
